Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - The code encountered a critical variable scoping error that prevented all search result processing. While the search queries executed successfully and found results (10 results per query), a NameError occurred when trying to process each result: 'name 'full_text' is not defined'. This error happened because the 'full_text' variable was being referenced before it was properly defined in the result processing loop. The bug caused 0% completion of the **PLAN** requirements - no search results were analyzed, no historical evidence was collected, and no LDS Church 1962 property acquisition information was extracted. The code did successfully save empty result files to the workspace directory. **Fix needed**: Move the 'full_text = f"{title} {body}"' line to occur immediately after the title and body variables are extracted from each result, before any analysis that references 'full_text'. This simple variable ordering fix will allow the search result analysis to proceed and fulfill the **PLAN** objective of identifying LDS Church property acquisition activities in 1962.
Python Code python
from ddgs import DDGS import os import json import time from collections import Counter print('=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH - HARMONY/OAKLAND PENNSYLVANIA ===') print('Objective: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring/restoring historical properties in 1962') print('Focus: Harmony/Oakland PA area, Susquehanna County, following 1960 Priesthood Restoration Site monument\n') # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Initialize research results research_results = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Identify LDS Church 1962 property acquisition and restoration in Harmony/Oakland PA area', 'focus_areas': [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Pennsylvania', 'Historical property restoration Harmony/Oakland PA 1962', 'Susquehanna County LDS Church projects early 1960s', 'Church publications documenting 1962 restoration initiative', 'Local Pennsylvania historical society records LDS projects' ], 'search_queries': [], 'search_results': [], 'historical_evidence': {}, 'timeline_information': [], 'analysis_summary': {} } print('TARGET RESEARCH ELEMENTS:') for i, area in enumerate(research_results['focus_areas'], 1): print(f' {i}. {area}') # Define targeted search queries for LDS Church 1962 property projects search_queries = [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania Susquehanna County', '"Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints" 1962 property restoration Pennsylvania', 'Mormon Church historical property acquisition 1962 Oakland Pennsylvania', 'LDS Church Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 property projects Pennsylvania', 'Harmony Pennsylvania LDS Church property restoration early 1960s', 'Susquehanna County Pennsylvania Mormon Church property acquisition 1962', '"1962" LDS Church historical property restoration Pennsylvania Harmony Oakland', 'Church of Jesus Christ Latter-day Saints Pennsylvania property projects 1960s', 'Mormon Church Susquehanna County property acquisition restoration 1962', 'LDS Church historical records 1962 Pennsylvania property restoration initiative' ] print(f'\nExecuting {len(search_queries)} targeted searches:') for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f' {i}. {query}') # Initialize search engine searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) print('\n=== PHASE 1: SYSTEMATIC SEARCH EXECUTION ===') print('=' * 80) # Execute searches with proper variable scoping for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}') print('-' * 70) try: # Execute search results = searcher.text( query, max_results=10, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing", "yahoo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if results: print(f'Found {len(results)} results') # Initialize query findings query_findings = { 'query': query, 'search_number': i, 'results_count': len(results), 'relevant_results': [], 'historical_indicators': [], 'timeline_references': [] } # Define key terms for relevance analysis key_terms = { 'lds church': 10, 'church of jesus christ': 10, 'latter-day saints': 10, 'mormon church': 8, '1962': 12, 'property acquisition': 10, 'property restoration': 10, 'historical property': 8, 'harmony': 10, 'oakland': 8, 'pennsylvania': 8, 'susquehanna county': 10, 'priesthood restoration': 10, '1960': 8, 'monument': 6, 'restoration site': 8, 'church publications': 8, 'historical society': 6, 'early 1960s': 8 } # Analyze each search result for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): # Extract data safely title = result.get('title', '').lower() body = result.get('body', '').lower() url = result.get('href', '') # Create combined text for analysis full_text = f"{title} {body}" print(f' Processing result {j}: {len(full_text)} chars') # Calculate relevance score relevance_score = 0 found_terms = [] for term, weight in key_terms.items(): if term in full_text: found_terms.append(term) relevance_score += weight # Check for historical indicators historical_indicators = [] if any(term in full_text for term in ['lds church', 'church of jesus christ', 'latter-day saints', 'mormon church']): historical_indicators.append('LDS Church confirmed') print(' 🏛️ LDS Church confirmed!') if '1962' in full_text: historical_indicators.append('1962 date confirmed') print(' 📅 1962 date confirmed!') if any(term in full_text for term in ['property acquisition', 'property restoration', 'historical property']): historical_indicators.append('Property project reference found') print(' 🏠 Property project reference!') if any(term in full_text for term in ['harmony', 'oakland']): historical_indicators.append('Harmony/Oakland location confirmed') print(' 📍 Harmony/Oakland location confirmed!') if 'susquehanna county' in full_text or 'pennsylvania' in full_text: historical_indicators.append('Pennsylvania location confirmed') print(' 🗺️ Pennsylvania location confirmed!') if 'priesthood restoration' in full_text: historical_indicators.append('Priesthood Restoration Site reference') print(' ⛪ Priesthood Restoration Site reference!') if any(term in full_text for term in ['1960', '1961', '1963', 'early 1960s']): historical_indicators.append('Early 1960s timeframe confirmed') print(' ⏰ Early 1960s timeframe confirmed!') # Store relevant results (score >= 8 or has historical indicators) if relevance_score >= 8 or len(historical_indicators) > 0: relevant_result = { 'result_number': j, 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'body': result.get('body', ''), 'url': url, 'relevance_score': relevance_score, 'found_terms': found_terms, 'historical_indicators': historical_indicators } query_findings['relevant_results'].append(relevant_result) query_findings['historical_indicators'].extend(historical_indicators) print(f' 📋 RELEVANT: Score {relevance_score}, Indicators: {", ".join(historical_indicators)}') print(f' Title: {result.get("title", "")[:100]}...') # Look for timeline information if any(term in full_text for term in ['1962', '1960', '1961', '1963', 'early 1960s']): timeline_text = f"{result.get('title', '')} - {result.get('body', '')[:200]}" query_findings['timeline_references'].append(timeline_text) # Show query summary total_relevant = len(query_findings['relevant_results']) unique_indicators = len(set(query_findings['historical_indicators'])) print(f'\n📊 Query Summary:') print(f' • Relevant results: {total_relevant}/{len(results)}') print(f' • Historical indicators: {unique_indicators}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(query_findings["timeline_references"])}') if query_findings['historical_indicators']: indicator_counts = Counter(query_findings['historical_indicators']) top_indicators = [f"{ind}({count})" for ind, count in indicator_counts.most_common(3)] print(f' • Top indicators: {", ".join(top_indicators)}') # Store query findings research_results['search_results'].append(query_findings) research_results['search_queries'].append(query) else: print('❌ No results found') research_results['search_queries'].append(query) except Exception as e: print(f'❌ Search error: {str(e)}') research_results['search_queries'].append(query) # Rate limiting time.sleep(2) print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('PHASE 2: COMPREHENSIVE EVIDENCE ANALYSIS') print('=' * 80) total_searches = len(research_results['search_results']) print(f'Completed searches: {total_searches}') if research_results['search_results']: # Compile all evidence across searches all_relevant_results = [] all_historical_indicators = [] all_timeline_references = [] for search_data in research_results['search_results']: all_relevant_results.extend(search_data['relevant_results']) all_historical_indicators.extend(search_data['historical_indicators']) all_timeline_references.extend(search_data['timeline_references']) print(f'\n📊 OVERALL RESEARCH STATISTICS:') print(f' • Total relevant results: {len(all_relevant_results)}') print(f' • Historical indicators found: {len(all_historical_indicators)}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(all_timeline_references)}') # Analyze evidence frequency indicator_counts = Counter(all_historical_indicators) print('\n📈 HISTORICAL EVIDENCE FREQUENCY:') print('-' * 45) for indicator, count in indicator_counts.most_common(): print(f' • {indicator}: {count} mentions') # Focus area evidence analysis evidence_analysis = { 'lds_church_confirmed': 'LDS Church confirmed' in all_historical_indicators, 'year_1962_confirmed': '1962 date confirmed' in all_historical_indicators, 'property_projects_confirmed': 'Property project reference found' in all_historical_indicators, 'harmony_oakland_location': 'Harmony/Oakland location confirmed' in all_historical_indicators, 'pennsylvania_confirmed': 'Pennsylvania location confirmed' in all_historical_indicators, 'priesthood_restoration_connection': 'Priesthood Restoration Site reference' in all_historical_indicators, 'early_1960s_timeframe': 'Early 1960s timeframe confirmed' in all_historical_indicators } research_results['historical_evidence'] = evidence_analysis print('\n🔍 FOCUS AREA EVIDENCE ANALYSIS:') print('-' * 45) for area, confirmed in evidence_analysis.items(): status = '✅' if confirmed else '❌' print(f'{status} {area.replace("_", " ").title()}: {confirmed}') # Calculate research success rate confirmed_count = sum(evidence_analysis.values()) success_percentage = (confirmed_count / len(evidence_analysis)) * 100 print(f'\n📈 RESEARCH SUCCESS RATE: {success_percentage:.1f}% ({confirmed_count}/{len(evidence_analysis)} areas confirmed)') research_results['analysis_summary']['success_percentage'] = success_percentage # Identify top findings by relevance all_relevant_results.sort(key=lambda x: x['relevance_score'], reverse=True) print('\n🎯 TOP HIGH-RELEVANCE FINDINGS:') print('-' * 50) for i, result in enumerate(all_relevant_results[:5], 1): print(f'\n{i}. Score: {result["relevance_score"]} | Evidence: {", ".join(result["historical_indicators"])}') print(f' Title: {result["title"][:120]}...') print(f' URL: {result["url"]}') print(f' Terms: {", ".join(result["found_terms"][:6])}') if result.get('body'): print(f' Content: {result["body"][:150]}...') # Compile unique timeline information unique_timeline = list(set(all_timeline_references)) research_results['timeline_information'] = unique_timeline[:10] if unique_timeline: print('\n📅 HISTORICAL TIMELINE REFERENCES:') print('-' * 50) for i, timeline_ref in enumerate(unique_timeline[:5], 1): print(f'{i}. {timeline_ref[:250]}...') else: print('❌ No search results collected') # Save comprehensive research results results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_property_research.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(research_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\n💾 COMPREHENSIVE RESEARCH SAVED TO: {results_file}') # Create summary report summary_content = f'''LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH HARMONY/OAKLAND PENNSYLVANIA AREA Generated: {research_results["timestamp"]} RESEARCH OBJECTIVE: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring and restoring historical properties in 1962, following their 1960 monument placement at the Priesthood Restoration Site. FOCUS AREAS: ''' for area in research_results['focus_areas']: summary_content += f'• {area}\n' summary_content += f'''\nSEARCH EXECUTION: • Queries executed: {len(research_results["search_queries"])} • Successful searches: {len(research_results["search_results"])} ''' if research_results['search_results']: summary_content += f'• Total relevant results: {len(all_relevant_results)}\n' if research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage'): summary_content += f'• Research success rate: {research_results["analysis_summary"]["success_percentage"]:.1f}%\n' summary_content += f'''\nEVIDENCE ANALYSIS:\n''' if research_results.get('historical_evidence'): for area, confirmed in research_results['historical_evidence'].items(): status = 'CONFIRMED' if confirmed else 'NOT FOUND' summary_content += f'• {area.replace("_", " ").title()}: {status}\n' summary_content += f'''\nTOP FINDINGS:\n''' for i, result in enumerate(all_relevant_results[:3], 1): summary_content += f'''{i}. {result["title"]} URL: {result["url"]} Relevance Score: {result["relevance_score"]} Evidence: {", ".join(result["historical_indicators"])} Content: {result.get("body", "")[:200]}... ''' summary_content += f'''FILES GENERATED: • lds_church_1962_property_research.json - Complete research data • lds_church_1962_summary_report.txt - This summary report CONCLUSIONS: ''' if research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage', 0) >= 60: summary_content += 'Research successful - multiple historical elements confirmed\n' elif research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage', 0) >= 30: summary_content += 'Partial success - some historical elements identified\n' else: summary_content += 'Limited success - further targeted research recommended\n' # Save summary report report_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_summary_report.txt') with open(report_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(summary_content) print(f'📋 FINAL REPORT SAVED TO: {report_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 90) print('LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH COMPLETE') print('=' * 90) if research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage', 0) >= 50: print('✅ RESEARCH SUCCESSFUL - Historical elements identified') elif research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage', 0) >= 25: print('⚠️ PARTIAL SUCCESS - Some elements found') else: print('❌ LIMITED SUCCESS - Alternative approaches needed') print('\n📊 FINAL RESEARCH STATISTICS:') print(f' • Search queries executed: {len(research_results["search_queries"])}') print(f' • Successful searches: {len(research_results["search_results"])}') print(f' • Relevant results found: {len(all_relevant_results) if research_results["search_results"] else 0}') print(f' • Historical indicators: {len(set(all_historical_indicators)) if research_results["search_results"] else 0}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(research_results.get("timeline_information", []))}') if research_results.get('historical_evidence'): confirmed_areas = [area.replace('_', ' ').title() for area, confirmed in research_results['historical_evidence'].items() if confirmed] if confirmed_areas: print('\n🎯 CONFIRMED HISTORICAL ELEMENTS:') for area in confirmed_areas: print(f' ✅ {area}') print('\n=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH COMPLETE ===')
Execution Output
Code Output: === LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH - HARMONY/OAKLAND PENNSYLVANIA === Objective: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring/restoring historical properties in 1962 Focus: Harmony/Oakland PA area, Susquehanna County, following 1960 Priesthood Restoration Site monument TARGET RESEARCH ELEMENTS: 1. LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Pennsylvania 2. Historical property restoration Harmony/Oakland PA 1962 3. Susquehanna County LDS Church projects early 1960s 4. Church publications documenting 1962 restoration initiative 5. Local Pennsylvania historical society records LDS projects Executing 10 targeted searches: 1. LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania Susquehanna County 2. "Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints" 1962 property restoration Pennsylvania 3. Mormon Church historical property acquisition 1962 Oakland Pennsylvania 4. LDS Church Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 property projects Pennsylvania 5. Harmony Pennsylvania LDS Church property restoration early 1960s 6. Susquehanna County Pennsylvania Mormon Church property acquisition 1962 7. "1962" LDS Church historical property restoration Pennsylvania Harmony Oakland 8. Church of Jesus Christ Latter-day Saints Pennsylvania property projects 1960s 9. Mormon Church Susquehanna County property acquisition restoration 1962 10. LDS Church historical records 1962 Pennsylvania property restoration initiative === PHASE 1: SYSTEMATIC SEARCH EXECUTION === 1962 ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Found 10 results Processing result 1: 147 chars ❌ Search error: name 'full_text' is not defined [WORKSPACE] Using task-specific workspace: workspace_webshaper_68 Search 7/10: "1962" LDS Church historical property restoration Pennsylvania Harmony Oakland ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Found 10 results Processing result 1: 314 chars ❌ Search error: name 'full_text' is not defined Search 8/10: Church of Jesus Christ Latter-day Saints Pennsylvania property projects 1960s ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Found 10 results Processing result 1: 190 chars ❌ Search error: name 'full_text' is not defined Search 9/10: Mormon Church Susquehanna County property acquisition restoration 1962 ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Found 10 results Processing result 1: 279 chars ❌ Search error: name 'full_text' is not defined Search 10/10: LDS Church historical records 1962 Pennsylvania property restoration initiative • Successful searches: 0 • Relevant results found: 0 • Historical indicators: 0 • Timeline references: 0 === LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH COMPLETE ===

Code Execution - Plan #2 (Iteration 2)
Executing development phase code:
Python Code python
from ddgs import DDGS import os import json import time from collections import Counter print('=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH - FIXED VARIABLE SCOPE ===') print('Objective: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring/restoring historical properties in 1962') print('Focus: Harmony/Oakland PA area, Susquehanna County, following 1960 Priesthood Restoration Site monument') print('Fix applied: Proper variable scoping for full_text in result processing loop\n') # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Initialize research results research_results = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Identify LDS Church 1962 property acquisition and restoration in Harmony/Oakland PA area', 'focus_areas': [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Pennsylvania', 'Historical property restoration Harmony/Oakland PA 1962', 'Susquehanna County LDS Church projects early 1960s', 'Church publications documenting 1962 restoration initiative', 'Local Pennsylvania historical society records LDS projects' ], 'search_queries': [], 'search_results': [], 'historical_evidence': {}, 'timeline_information': [], 'analysis_summary': {} } print('TARGET RESEARCH ELEMENTS:') for i, area in enumerate(research_results['focus_areas'], 1): print(f' {i}. {area}') # Define targeted search queries for LDS Church 1962 property projects search_queries = [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania Susquehanna County', '"Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints" 1962 property restoration Pennsylvania', 'Mormon Church historical property acquisition 1962 Oakland Pennsylvania', 'LDS Church Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 property projects Pennsylvania', 'Harmony Pennsylvania LDS Church property restoration early 1960s', 'Susquehanna County Pennsylvania Mormon Church property acquisition 1962', '"1962" LDS Church historical property restoration Pennsylvania Harmony Oakland', 'Church of Jesus Christ Latter-day Saints Pennsylvania property projects 1960s' ] print(f'\nExecuting {len(search_queries)} targeted searches:') for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f' {i}. {query}') # Initialize search engine searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) print('\n=== PHASE 1: SYSTEMATIC SEARCH EXECUTION ===') print('=' * 80) # Execute searches with FIXED variable scoping for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}') print('-' * 70) try: # Execute search results = searcher.text( query, max_results=10, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing", "yahoo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if results: print(f'Found {len(results)} results') # Initialize query findings query_findings = { 'query': query, 'search_number': i, 'results_count': len(results), 'relevant_results': [], 'historical_indicators': [], 'timeline_references': [] } # Define key terms for relevance analysis key_terms = { 'lds church': 10, 'church of jesus christ': 10, 'latter-day saints': 10, 'mormon church': 8, '1962': 12, 'property acquisition': 10, 'property restoration': 10, 'historical property': 8, 'harmony': 10, 'oakland': 8, 'pennsylvania': 8, 'susquehanna county': 10, 'priesthood restoration': 10, '1960': 8, 'monument': 6, 'restoration site': 8, 'church publications': 8, 'historical society': 6, 'early 1960s': 8 } # Analyze each search result with PROPER variable scoping for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): # CRITICAL FIX: Extract data and define full_text immediately title = result.get('title', '').lower() body = result.get('body', '').lower() url = result.get('href', '') # FIXED: Define full_text right after extracting title and body full_text = f"{title} {body}" print(f' Processing result {j}: {len(full_text)} chars') # Calculate relevance score - full_text is now properly defined relevance_score = 0 found_terms = [] for term, weight in key_terms.items(): if term in full_text: found_terms.append(term) relevance_score += weight # Check for historical indicators - full_text properly scoped historical_indicators = [] if any(term in full_text for term in ['lds church', 'church of jesus christ', 'latter-day saints', 'mormon church']): historical_indicators.append('LDS Church confirmed') print(' 🏛️ LDS Church confirmed!') if '1962' in full_text: historical_indicators.append('1962 date confirmed') print(' 📅 1962 date confirmed!') if any(term in full_text for term in ['property acquisition', 'property restoration', 'historical property']): historical_indicators.append('Property project reference found') print(' 🏠 Property project reference!') if any(term in full_text for term in ['harmony', 'oakland']): historical_indicators.append('Harmony/Oakland location confirmed') print(' 📍 Harmony/Oakland location confirmed!') if 'susquehanna county' in full_text or 'pennsylvania' in full_text: historical_indicators.append('Pennsylvania location confirmed') print(' 🗺️ Pennsylvania location confirmed!') if 'priesthood restoration' in full_text: historical_indicators.append('Priesthood Restoration Site reference') print(' ⛪ Priesthood Restoration Site reference!') if any(term in full_text for term in ['1960', '1961', '1963', 'early 1960s']): historical_indicators.append('Early 1960s timeframe confirmed') print(' ⏰ Early 1960s timeframe confirmed!') # Store relevant results (score >= 8 or has historical indicators) if relevance_score >= 8 or len(historical_indicators) > 0: relevant_result = { 'result_number': j, 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'body': result.get('body', ''), 'url': url, 'relevance_score': relevance_score, 'found_terms': found_terms, 'historical_indicators': historical_indicators } query_findings['relevant_results'].append(relevant_result) query_findings['historical_indicators'].extend(historical_indicators) print(f' 📋 RELEVANT: Score {relevance_score}, Indicators: {", ".join(historical_indicators)}') print(f' Title: {result.get("title", "")[:100]}...') # Look for timeline information if any(term in full_text for term in ['1962', '1960', '1961', '1963', 'early 1960s']): timeline_text = f"{result.get('title', '')} - {result.get('body', '')[:200]}" query_findings['timeline_references'].append(timeline_text) # Show query summary total_relevant = len(query_findings['relevant_results']) unique_indicators = len(set(query_findings['historical_indicators'])) print(f'\n📊 Query Summary:') print(f' • Relevant results: {total_relevant}/{len(results)}') print(f' • Historical indicators: {unique_indicators}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(query_findings["timeline_references"])}') if query_findings['historical_indicators']: indicator_counts = Counter(query_findings['historical_indicators']) top_indicators = [f"{ind}({count})" for ind, count in indicator_counts.most_common(3)] print(f' • Top indicators: {", ".join(top_indicators)}') # Store query findings research_results['search_results'].append(query_findings) research_results['search_queries'].append(query) else: print('❌ No results found') research_results['search_queries'].append(query) except Exception as e: print(f'❌ Search error: {str(e)}') research_results['search_queries'].append(query) # Rate limiting time.sleep(2) print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('PHASE 2: COMPREHENSIVE EVIDENCE ANALYSIS') print('=' * 80) total_searches = len(research_results['search_results']) print(f'Completed searches: {total_searches}') if research_results['search_results']: # Compile all evidence across searches all_relevant_results = [] all_historical_indicators = [] all_timeline_references = [] for search_data in research_results['search_results']: all_relevant_results.extend(search_data['relevant_results']) all_historical_indicators.extend(search_data['historical_indicators']) all_timeline_references.extend(search_data['timeline_references']) print(f'\n📊 OVERALL RESEARCH STATISTICS:') print(f' • Total relevant results: {len(all_relevant_results)}') print(f' • Historical indicators found: {len(all_historical_indicators)}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(all_timeline_references)}') # Analyze evidence frequency indicator_counts = Counter(all_historical_indicators) print('\n📈 HISTORICAL EVIDENCE FREQUENCY:') print('-' * 45) for indicator, count in indicator_counts.most_common(): print(f' • {indicator}: {count} mentions') # Focus area evidence analysis evidence_analysis = { 'lds_church_confirmed': 'LDS Church confirmed' in all_historical_indicators, 'year_1962_confirmed': '1962 date confirmed' in all_historical_indicators, 'property_projects_confirmed': 'Property project reference found' in all_historical_indicators, 'harmony_oakland_location': 'Harmony/Oakland location confirmed' in all_historical_indicators, 'pennsylvania_confirmed': 'Pennsylvania location confirmed' in all_historical_indicators, 'priesthood_restoration_connection': 'Priesthood Restoration Site reference' in all_historical_indicators, 'early_1960s_timeframe': 'Early 1960s timeframe confirmed' in all_historical_indicators } research_results['historical_evidence'] = evidence_analysis print('\n🔍 FOCUS AREA EVIDENCE ANALYSIS:') print('-' * 45) for area, confirmed in evidence_analysis.items(): status = '✅' if confirmed else '❌' print(f'{status} {area.replace("_", " ").title()}: {confirmed}') # Calculate research success rate confirmed_count = sum(evidence_analysis.values()) success_percentage = (confirmed_count / len(evidence_analysis)) * 100 print(f'\n📈 RESEARCH SUCCESS RATE: {success_percentage:.1f}% ({confirmed_count}/{len(evidence_analysis)} areas confirmed)') research_results['analysis_summary']['success_percentage'] = success_percentage # Identify top findings by relevance all_relevant_results.sort(key=lambda x: x['relevance_score'], reverse=True) print('\n🎯 TOP HIGH-RELEVANCE FINDINGS:') print('-' * 50) for i, result in enumerate(all_relevant_results[:5], 1): print(f'\n{i}. Score: {result["relevance_score"]} | Evidence: {", ".join(result["historical_indicators"])}') print(f' Title: {result["title"][:120]}...') print(f' URL: {result["url"]}') print(f' Terms: {", ".join(result["found_terms"][:6])}') if result.get('body'): print(f' Content: {result["body"][:150]}...') # Compile unique timeline information unique_timeline = list(set(all_timeline_references)) research_results['timeline_information'] = unique_timeline[:10] if unique_timeline: print('\n📅 HISTORICAL TIMELINE REFERENCES:') print('-' * 50) for i, timeline_ref in enumerate(unique_timeline[:5], 1): print(f'{i}. {timeline_ref[:250]}...') else: print('❌ No search results collected') # Save comprehensive research results results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_property_research_fixed.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(research_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\n💾 COMPREHENSIVE RESEARCH SAVED TO: {results_file}') # Create summary report summary_content = f'''LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH HARMONY/OAKLAND PENNSYLVANIA AREA - FIXED VERSION Generated: {research_results["timestamp"]} RESEARCH OBJECTIVE: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring and restoring historical properties in 1962, following their 1960 monument placement at the Priesthood Restoration Site. FOCUS AREAS: ''' for area in research_results['focus_areas']: summary_content += f'• {area}\n' summary_content += f'''\nSEARCH EXECUTION: • Queries executed: {len(research_results["search_queries"])} • Successful searches: {len(research_results["search_results"])} ''' if research_results['search_results']: summary_content += f'• Total relevant results: {len(all_relevant_results)}\n' if research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage'): summary_content += f'• Research success rate: {research_results["analysis_summary"]["success_percentage"]:.1f}%\n' summary_content += f'''\nEVIDENCE ANALYSIS:\n''' if research_results.get('historical_evidence'): for area, confirmed in research_results['historical_evidence'].items(): status = 'CONFIRMED' if confirmed else 'NOT FOUND' summary_content += f'• {area.replace("_", " ").title()}: {status}\n' summary_content += f'''\nTOP FINDINGS:\n''' for i, result in enumerate(all_relevant_results[:3], 1): summary_content += f'''{i}. {result["title"]} URL: {result["url"]} Relevance Score: {result["relevance_score"]} Evidence: {", ".join(result["historical_indicators"])} Content: {result.get("body", "")[:200]}... ''' summary_content += f'''FILES GENERATED: • lds_church_1962_property_research_fixed.json - Complete research data • lds_church_1962_summary_report_fixed.txt - This summary report CONCLUSIONS: ''' if research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage', 0) >= 60: summary_content += 'Research successful - multiple historical elements confirmed\n' elif research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage', 0) >= 30: summary_content += 'Partial success - some historical elements identified\n' else: summary_content += 'Limited success - further targeted research recommended\n' # Save summary report report_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_summary_report_fixed.txt') with open(report_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(summary_content) print(f'📋 FINAL REPORT SAVED TO: {report_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 90) print('LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH COMPLETE - FIXED VERSION') print('=' * 90) if research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage', 0) >= 50: print('✅ RESEARCH SUCCESSFUL - Historical elements identified') elif research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage', 0) >= 25: print('⚠️ PARTIAL SUCCESS - Some elements found') else: print('❌ LIMITED SUCCESS - Alternative approaches needed') print('\n📊 FINAL RESEARCH STATISTICS:') print(f' • Search queries executed: {len(research_results["search_queries"])}') print(f' • Successful searches: {len(research_results["search_results"])}') print(f' • Relevant results found: {len(all_relevant_results) if research_results["search_results"] else 0}') print(f' • Historical indicators: {len(set(all_historical_indicators)) if research_results["search_results"] else 0}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(research_results.get("timeline_information", []))}') if research_results.get('historical_evidence'): confirmed_areas = [area.replace('_', ' ').title() for area, confirmed in research_results['historical_evidence'].items() if confirmed] if confirmed_areas: print('\n🎯 CONFIRMED HISTORICAL ELEMENTS:') for area in confirmed_areas: print(f' ✅ {area}') print('\n=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH COMPLETE ===')

Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - The code still has the same critical variable scoping error despite the attempted fix. All 8 search queries executed successfully and found 10 results each, but the same NameError occurred: 'name 'full_text' is not defined'. Looking at the code, the issue persists because the 'full_text' variable definition is still not properly positioned in the result processing loop. The error occurs at the exact same point during result processing, preventing any analysis of the search results. **PLAN** completion: 0% - no historical evidence was collected, no LDS Church 1962 property information was extracted, and no research objectives were met. The code did save empty result files to workspace. **Critical fix needed**: The 'full_text = f"{title} {body}"' line appears to be correctly placed after the title/body extraction, but there may be an indentation issue or the variable is being referenced elsewhere before definition. Carefully check the exact line positioning and indentation of the full_text variable definition to ensure it occurs immediately after title/body extraction and before any usage of full_text in the analysis logic.
Python Code python
from ddgs import DDGS import os import json import time from collections import Counter print('=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH - FIXED VARIABLE SCOPE ===') print('Objective: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring/restoring historical properties in 1962') print('Focus: Harmony/Oakland PA area, Susquehanna County, following 1960 Priesthood Restoration Site monument') print('Fix applied: Proper variable scoping for full_text in result processing loop\n') # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Initialize research results research_results = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Identify LDS Church 1962 property acquisition and restoration in Harmony/Oakland PA area', 'focus_areas': [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Pennsylvania', 'Historical property restoration Harmony/Oakland PA 1962', 'Susquehanna County LDS Church projects early 1960s', 'Church publications documenting 1962 restoration initiative', 'Local Pennsylvania historical society records LDS projects' ], 'search_queries': [], 'search_results': [], 'historical_evidence': {}, 'timeline_information': [], 'analysis_summary': {} } print('TARGET RESEARCH ELEMENTS:') for i, area in enumerate(research_results['focus_areas'], 1): print(f' {i}. {area}') # Define targeted search queries for LDS Church 1962 property projects search_queries = [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania Susquehanna County', '"Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints" 1962 property restoration Pennsylvania', 'Mormon Church historical property acquisition 1962 Oakland Pennsylvania', 'LDS Church Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 property projects Pennsylvania', 'Harmony Pennsylvania LDS Church property restoration early 1960s', 'Susquehanna County Pennsylvania Mormon Church property acquisition 1962', '"1962" LDS Church historical property restoration Pennsylvania Harmony Oakland', 'Church of Jesus Christ Latter-day Saints Pennsylvania property projects 1960s' ] print(f'\nExecuting {len(search_queries)} targeted searches:') for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f' {i}. {query}') # Initialize search engine searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) print('\n=== PHASE 1: SYSTEMATIC SEARCH EXECUTION ===') print('=' * 80) # Execute searches with FIXED variable scoping for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}') print('-' * 70) try: # Execute search results = searcher.text( query, max_results=10, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing", "yahoo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if results: print(f'Found {len(results)} results') # Initialize query findings query_findings = { 'query': query, 'search_number': i, 'results_count': len(results), 'relevant_results': [], 'historical_indicators': [], 'timeline_references': [] } # Define key terms for relevance analysis key_terms = { 'lds church': 10, 'church of jesus christ': 10, 'latter-day saints': 10, 'mormon church': 8, '1962': 12, 'property acquisition': 10, 'property restoration': 10, 'historical property': 8, 'harmony': 10, 'oakland': 8, 'pennsylvania': 8, 'susquehanna county': 10, 'priesthood restoration': 10, '1960': 8, 'monument': 6, 'restoration site': 8, 'church publications': 8, 'historical society': 6, 'early 1960s': 8 } # Analyze each search result with PROPER variable scoping for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): # CRITICAL FIX: Extract data and define full_text immediately title = result.get('title', '').lower() body = result.get('body', '').lower() url = result.get('href', '') # FIXED: Define full_text right after extracting title and body full_text = f"{title} {body}" print(f' Processing result {j}: {len(full_text)} chars') # Calculate relevance score - full_text is now properly defined relevance_score = 0 found_terms = [] for term, weight in key_terms.items(): if term in full_text: found_terms.append(term) relevance_score += weight # Check for historical indicators - full_text properly scoped historical_indicators = [] if any(term in full_text for term in ['lds church', 'church of jesus christ', 'latter-day saints', 'mormon church']): historical_indicators.append('LDS Church confirmed') print(' 🏛️ LDS Church confirmed!') if '1962' in full_text: historical_indicators.append('1962 date confirmed') print(' 📅 1962 date confirmed!') if any(term in full_text for term in ['property acquisition', 'property restoration', 'historical property']): historical_indicators.append('Property project reference found') print(' 🏠 Property project reference!') if any(term in full_text for term in ['harmony', 'oakland']): historical_indicators.append('Harmony/Oakland location confirmed') print(' 📍 Harmony/Oakland location confirmed!') if 'susquehanna county' in full_text or 'pennsylvania' in full_text: historical_indicators.append('Pennsylvania location confirmed') print(' 🗺️ Pennsylvania location confirmed!') if 'priesthood restoration' in full_text: historical_indicators.append('Priesthood Restoration Site reference') print(' ⛪ Priesthood Restoration Site reference!') if any(term in full_text for term in ['1960', '1961', '1963', 'early 1960s']): historical_indicators.append('Early 1960s timeframe confirmed') print(' ⏰ Early 1960s timeframe confirmed!') # Store relevant results (score >= 8 or has historical indicators) if relevance_score >= 8 or len(historical_indicators) > 0: relevant_result = { 'result_number': j, 'title': result.get('title', ''), 'body': result.get('body', ''), 'url': url, 'relevance_score': relevance_score, 'found_terms': found_terms, 'historical_indicators': historical_indicators } query_findings['relevant_results'].append(relevant_result) query_findings['historical_indicators'].extend(historical_indicators) print(f' 📋 RELEVANT: Score {relevance_score}, Indicators: {", ".join(historical_indicators)}') print(f' Title: {result.get("title", "")[:100]}...') # Look for timeline information if any(term in full_text for term in ['1962', '1960', '1961', '1963', 'early 1960s']): timeline_text = f"{result.get('title', '')} - {result.get('body', '')[:200]}" query_findings['timeline_references'].append(timeline_text) # Show query summary total_relevant = len(query_findings['relevant_results']) unique_indicators = len(set(query_findings['historical_indicators'])) print(f'\n📊 Query Summary:') print(f' • Relevant results: {total_relevant}/{len(results)}') print(f' • Historical indicators: {unique_indicators}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(query_findings["timeline_references"])}') if query_findings['historical_indicators']: indicator_counts = Counter(query_findings['historical_indicators']) top_indicators = [f"{ind}({count})" for ind, count in indicator_counts.most_common(3)] print(f' • Top indicators: {", ".join(top_indicators)}') # Store query findings research_results['search_results'].append(query_findings) research_results['search_queries'].append(query) else: print('❌ No results found') research_results['search_queries'].append(query) except Exception as e: print(f'❌ Search error: {str(e)}') research_results['search_queries'].append(query) # Rate limiting time.sleep(2) print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('PHASE 2: COMPREHENSIVE EVIDENCE ANALYSIS') print('=' * 80) total_searches = len(research_results['search_results']) print(f'Completed searches: {total_searches}') if research_results['search_results']: # Compile all evidence across searches all_relevant_results = [] all_historical_indicators = [] all_timeline_references = [] for search_data in research_results['search_results']: all_relevant_results.extend(search_data['relevant_results']) all_historical_indicators.extend(search_data['historical_indicators']) all_timeline_references.extend(search_data['timeline_references']) print(f'\n📊 OVERALL RESEARCH STATISTICS:') print(f' • Total relevant results: {len(all_relevant_results)}') print(f' • Historical indicators found: {len(all_historical_indicators)}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(all_timeline_references)}') # Analyze evidence frequency indicator_counts = Counter(all_historical_indicators) print('\n📈 HISTORICAL EVIDENCE FREQUENCY:') print('-' * 45) for indicator, count in indicator_counts.most_common(): print(f' • {indicator}: {count} mentions') # Focus area evidence analysis evidence_analysis = { 'lds_church_confirmed': 'LDS Church confirmed' in all_historical_indicators, 'year_1962_confirmed': '1962 date confirmed' in all_historical_indicators, 'property_projects_confirmed': 'Property project reference found' in all_historical_indicators, 'harmony_oakland_location': 'Harmony/Oakland location confirmed' in all_historical_indicators, 'pennsylvania_confirmed': 'Pennsylvania location confirmed' in all_historical_indicators, 'priesthood_restoration_connection': 'Priesthood Restoration Site reference' in all_historical_indicators, 'early_1960s_timeframe': 'Early 1960s timeframe confirmed' in all_historical_indicators } research_results['historical_evidence'] = evidence_analysis print('\n🔍 FOCUS AREA EVIDENCE ANALYSIS:') print('-' * 45) for area, confirmed in evidence_analysis.items(): status = '✅' if confirmed else '❌' print(f'{status} {area.replace("_", " ").title()}: {confirmed}') # Calculate research success rate confirmed_count = sum(evidence_analysis.values()) success_percentage = (confirmed_count / len(evidence_analysis)) * 100 print(f'\n📈 RESEARCH SUCCESS RATE: {success_percentage:.1f}% ({confirmed_count}/{len(evidence_analysis)} areas confirmed)') research_results['analysis_summary']['success_percentage'] = success_percentage # Identify top findings by relevance all_relevant_results.sort(key=lambda x: x['relevance_score'], reverse=True) print('\n🎯 TOP HIGH-RELEVANCE FINDINGS:') print('-' * 50) for i, result in enumerate(all_relevant_results[:5], 1): print(f'\n{i}. Score: {result["relevance_score"]} | Evidence: {", ".join(result["historical_indicators"])}') print(f' Title: {result["title"][:120]}...') print(f' URL: {result["url"]}') print(f' Terms: {", ".join(result["found_terms"][:6])}') if result.get('body'): print(f' Content: {result["body"][:150]}...') # Compile unique timeline information unique_timeline = list(set(all_timeline_references)) research_results['timeline_information'] = unique_timeline[:10] if unique_timeline: print('\n📅 HISTORICAL TIMELINE REFERENCES:') print('-' * 50) for i, timeline_ref in enumerate(unique_timeline[:5], 1): print(f'{i}. {timeline_ref[:250]}...') else: print('❌ No search results collected') # Save comprehensive research results results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_property_research_fixed.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(research_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\n💾 COMPREHENSIVE RESEARCH SAVED TO: {results_file}') # Create summary report summary_content = f'''LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH HARMONY/OAKLAND PENNSYLVANIA AREA - FIXED VERSION Generated: {research_results["timestamp"]} RESEARCH OBJECTIVE: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring and restoring historical properties in 1962, following their 1960 monument placement at the Priesthood Restoration Site. FOCUS AREAS: ''' for area in research_results['focus_areas']: summary_content += f'• {area}\n' summary_content += f'''\nSEARCH EXECUTION: • Queries executed: {len(research_results["search_queries"])} • Successful searches: {len(research_results["search_results"])} ''' if research_results['search_results']: summary_content += f'• Total relevant results: {len(all_relevant_results)}\n' if research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage'): summary_content += f'• Research success rate: {research_results["analysis_summary"]["success_percentage"]:.1f}%\n' summary_content += f'''\nEVIDENCE ANALYSIS:\n''' if research_results.get('historical_evidence'): for area, confirmed in research_results['historical_evidence'].items(): status = 'CONFIRMED' if confirmed else 'NOT FOUND' summary_content += f'• {area.replace("_", " ").title()}: {status}\n' summary_content += f'''\nTOP FINDINGS:\n''' for i, result in enumerate(all_relevant_results[:3], 1): summary_content += f'''{i}. {result["title"]} URL: {result["url"]} Relevance Score: {result["relevance_score"]} Evidence: {", ".join(result["historical_indicators"])} Content: {result.get("body", "")[:200]}... ''' summary_content += f'''FILES GENERATED: • lds_church_1962_property_research_fixed.json - Complete research data • lds_church_1962_summary_report_fixed.txt - This summary report CONCLUSIONS: ''' if research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage', 0) >= 60: summary_content += 'Research successful - multiple historical elements confirmed\n' elif research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage', 0) >= 30: summary_content += 'Partial success - some historical elements identified\n' else: summary_content += 'Limited success - further targeted research recommended\n' # Save summary report report_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_summary_report_fixed.txt') with open(report_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(summary_content) print(f'📋 FINAL REPORT SAVED TO: {report_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 90) print('LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH COMPLETE - FIXED VERSION') print('=' * 90) if research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage', 0) >= 50: print('✅ RESEARCH SUCCESSFUL - Historical elements identified') elif research_results.get('analysis_summary', {}).get('success_percentage', 0) >= 25: print('⚠️ PARTIAL SUCCESS - Some elements found') else: print('❌ LIMITED SUCCESS - Alternative approaches needed') print('\n📊 FINAL RESEARCH STATISTICS:') print(f' • Search queries executed: {len(research_results["search_queries"])}') print(f' • Successful searches: {len(research_results["search_results"])}') print(f' • Relevant results found: {len(all_relevant_results) if research_results["search_results"] else 0}') print(f' • Historical indicators: {len(set(all_historical_indicators)) if research_results["search_results"] else 0}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(research_results.get("timeline_information", []))}') if research_results.get('historical_evidence'): confirmed_areas = [area.replace('_', ' ').title() for area, confirmed in research_results['historical_evidence'].items() if confirmed] if confirmed_areas: print('\n🎯 CONFIRMED HISTORICAL ELEMENTS:') for area in confirmed_areas: print(f' ✅ {area}') print('\n=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH COMPLETE ===')

Python Code python
from ddgs import DDGS import os import json import time from collections import Counter print('=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH - SIMPLIFIED APPROACH ===') print('Objective: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring/restoring historical properties in 1962') print('Focus: Harmony/Oakland PA area, Susquehanna County, following 1960 Priesthood Restoration Site monument') print('Strategy: Simplified processing to avoid variable scoping issues\n') # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Initialize simplified results storage all_findings = [] all_evidence = [] search_summary = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Identify LDS Church 1962 property acquisition in Harmony/Oakland PA area', 'queries_executed': [], 'total_results_found': 0, 'relevant_results': 0 } # Define focused search queries queries = [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania', '"Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints" 1962 Pennsylvania property', 'Mormon Church 1962 property restoration Pennsylvania Susquehanna County', 'LDS Church Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 Pennsylvania projects', 'Harmony Pennsylvania LDS Church property restoration 1960s', 'Susquehanna County Mormon Church property acquisition 1962' ] print(f'Executing {len(queries)} focused searches:') for i, q in enumerate(queries, 1): print(f' {i}. {q}') # Initialize searcher searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) print('\n=== SEARCH EXECUTION WITH SIMPLIFIED PROCESSING ===') print('=' * 70) # Execute searches with completely simplified approach for i, query in enumerate(queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {i}: {query}') print('-' * 60) try: results = searcher.text( query, max_results=8, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if results: print(f'Found {len(results)} results') search_summary['total_results_found'] += len(results) # Process each result with direct, simple approach for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): # Extract data directly without complex variable handling title_text = result.get('title', '') body_text = result.get('body', '') url_text = result.get('href', '') # Create analysis text directly in one line to avoid scoping issues analysis_text = (title_text + ' ' + body_text).lower() print(f' Result {j}: {len(analysis_text)} chars') # Direct evidence collection without complex variables evidence_found = [] relevance = 0 # Check for LDS Church references if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['lds church', 'church of jesus christ', 'latter-day saints', 'mormon church']): evidence_found.append('LDS Church confirmed') relevance += 10 print(' 🏛️ LDS Church confirmed!') # Check for 1962 date if '1962' in analysis_text: evidence_found.append('1962 date confirmed') relevance += 12 print(' 📅 1962 date confirmed!') # Check for property-related terms if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['property acquisition', 'property restoration', 'historical property', 'property purchase']): evidence_found.append('Property project reference') relevance += 10 print(' 🏠 Property project reference!') # Check for location references if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['harmony', 'oakland']): evidence_found.append('Harmony/Oakland location') relevance += 10 print(' 📍 Harmony/Oakland location!') if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['pennsylvania', 'susquehanna county']): evidence_found.append('Pennsylvania location') relevance += 8 print(' 🗺️ Pennsylvania location!') # Check for Priesthood Restoration Site if 'priesthood restoration' in analysis_text: evidence_found.append('Priesthood Restoration Site') relevance += 10 print(' ⛪ Priesthood Restoration Site!') # Check for 1960s timeframe if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['1960', '1961', '1963', 'early 1960s', '1960s']): evidence_found.append('1960s timeframe') relevance += 6 print(' ⏰ 1960s timeframe!') # Store findings if relevant (score >= 10 or multiple evidence pieces) if relevance >= 10 or len(evidence_found) >= 2: finding = { 'search_number': i, 'result_number': j, 'query': query, 'title': title_text, 'body': body_text[:300], # Truncate for storage 'url': url_text, 'relevance_score': relevance, 'evidence': evidence_found } all_findings.append(finding) all_evidence.extend(evidence_found) search_summary['relevant_results'] += 1 print(f' 📋 STORED: Score {relevance}, Evidence: {", ".join(evidence_found)}') print(f' Title: {title_text[:80]}...') else: print('No results found') search_summary['queries_executed'].append(query) except Exception as e: print(f'Error in search {i}: {str(e)}') search_summary['queries_executed'].append(f'{query} (ERROR: {str(e)})') time.sleep(2) print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('COMPREHENSIVE ANALYSIS RESULTS') print('=' * 80) print(f'Total queries executed: {len(search_summary["queries_executed"])}') print(f'Total results found: {search_summary["total_results_found"]}') print(f'Relevant findings collected: {len(all_findings)}') print(f'Evidence pieces gathered: {len(all_evidence)}') if all_findings: # Sort findings by relevance all_findings.sort(key=lambda x: x['relevance_score'], reverse=True) print('\n📊 TOP FINDINGS BY RELEVANCE:') print('-' * 50) for i, finding in enumerate(all_findings[:5], 1): print(f'\n{i}. Score: {finding["relevance_score"]} | Search: {finding["search_number"]}') print(f' Title: {finding["title"][:100]}...') print(f' URL: {finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(finding["evidence"])}') print(f' Content: {finding["body"][:150]}...') # Count evidence types evidence_counts = Counter(all_evidence) print('\n📈 EVIDENCE FREQUENCY ANALYSIS:') print('-' * 40) for evidence, count in evidence_counts.most_common(): print(f' • {evidence}: {count} occurrences') # Focus area analysis for the PLAN objectives focus_results = { 'LDS Church identified': 'LDS Church confirmed' in all_evidence, '1962 date confirmed': '1962 date confirmed' in all_evidence, 'Property projects found': 'Property project reference' in all_evidence, 'Harmony/Oakland location': 'Harmony/Oakland location' in all_evidence, 'Pennsylvania confirmed': 'Pennsylvania location' in all_evidence, 'Priesthood Restoration connection': 'Priesthood Restoration Site' in all_evidence, '1960s timeframe': '1960s timeframe' in all_evidence } print('\n🔍 PLAN OBJECTIVE ANALYSIS:') print('-' * 40) confirmed_count = 0 for objective, found in focus_results.items(): status = '✅' if found else '❌' print(f'{status} {objective}: {found}') if found: confirmed_count += 1 success_rate = (confirmed_count / len(focus_results)) * 100 print(f'\n📈 RESEARCH SUCCESS RATE: {success_rate:.1f}% ({confirmed_count}/{len(focus_results)} objectives met)') # Extract specific town/location information location_findings = [] for finding in all_findings: if any(loc in finding['evidence'] for loc in ['Harmony/Oakland location', 'Pennsylvania location']): location_info = f"Title: {finding['title']} | Content: {finding['body'][:200]}" location_findings.append(location_info) if location_findings: print('\n📍 SPECIFIC LOCATION INFORMATION:') print('-' * 50) for i, location in enumerate(location_findings[:3], 1): print(f'{i}. {location}...') # Save comprehensive results final_results = { 'research_summary': search_summary, 'success_rate': success_rate, 'focus_objectives': focus_results, 'evidence_frequency': dict(evidence_counts), 'top_findings': all_findings[:10], 'location_specific_findings': location_findings[:5] } results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_final.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(final_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\n💾 Results saved to: {results_file}') # Create detailed summary report summary_report = f'''LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH HARMONY/OAKLAND PENNSYLVANIA AREA FINAL ANALYSIS REPORT Generated: {search_summary["timestamp"]} RESEARCH OBJECTIVE: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring and restoring historical properties in 1962, following their 1960 monument placement at the Priesthood Restoration Site. SEARCH EXECUTION SUMMARY: • Queries executed: {len(search_summary["queries_executed"])} • Total results found: {search_summary["total_results_found"]} • Relevant findings: {len(all_findings)} • Research success rate: {success_rate:.1f}% PLAN OBJECTIVE ANALYSIS: ''' for objective, found in focus_results.items(): status = 'CONFIRMED' if found else 'NOT FOUND' summary_report += f'• {objective}: {status}\n' summary_report += f'''\nEVIDENCE FREQUENCY: ''' for evidence, count in evidence_counts.most_common(): summary_report += f'• {evidence}: {count} mentions\n' summary_report += f'''\nTOP FINDINGS: ''' for i, finding in enumerate(all_findings[:3], 1): summary_report += f'''{i}. {finding["title"]} URL: {finding["url"]} Relevance: {finding["relevance_score"]} Evidence: {", ".join(finding["evidence"])} Content: {finding["body"][:200]}... ''' if location_findings: summary_report += f'''LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS: ''' for i, location in enumerate(location_findings[:3], 1): summary_report += f'{i}. {location}...\n\n' summary_report += f'''FILES GENERATED: • lds_church_1962_research_final.json - Complete research data • lds_church_1962_final_summary.txt - This summary report CONCLUSIONS: ''' if success_rate >= 60: summary_report += 'Research successful - multiple PLAN objectives confirmed\n' elif success_rate >= 40: summary_report += 'Partial success - some PLAN objectives identified\n' else: summary_report += 'Limited success - further targeted research recommended\n' # Save summary report summary_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_final_summary.txt') with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(summary_report) print(f'📋 Summary report saved to: {summary_file}') else: print('❌ No relevant findings collected') # Save empty results for reference empty_results = { 'research_summary': search_summary, 'success_rate': 0, 'message': 'No relevant findings collected' } results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_final.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(empty_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'💾 Empty results saved to: {results_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH COMPLETE') print('=' * 80) if len(all_findings) >= 5: print('✅ RESEARCH SUCCESSFUL - Multiple relevant findings collected') elif len(all_findings) >= 2: print('⚠️ PARTIAL SUCCESS - Some findings collected') else: print('❌ LIMITED SUCCESS - Few or no findings collected') print(f'\n📊 FINAL STATISTICS:') print(f' • Queries executed: {len(search_summary["queries_executed"])}') print(f' • Total results processed: {search_summary["total_results_found"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {len(all_findings)}') print(f' • Evidence pieces: {len(set(all_evidence)) if all_evidence else 0}') if all_evidence: unique_evidence = list(set(all_evidence)) print('\n🎯 EVIDENCE COLLECTED:') for evidence in unique_evidence: print(f' ✅ {evidence}') print('\n=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH COMPLETE ===')

Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - The code encountered a different issue than expected. The output shows it's executing searches successfully but there appears to be a context mixing problem where the search results are being processed by an unrelated São Francisco River research system instead of the LDS Church research code. The output contains references to 'Usina_Hidreletrica_de_Sobradinho', 'CHESF', 'CODEVASF', and São Francisco River content, which are completely unrelated to the **PLAN** objective of finding LDS Church 1962 property acquisition in Pennsylvania. This suggests the search system may be returning cached or mixed results from a different research session. **PLAN** alignment: 0% - no LDS Church, Pennsylvania, or 1962 property information was processed. The code structure appears sound with proper variable scoping fixes, but the search execution is not returning relevant results for the intended queries. **Recommended fix**: Clear any cached search results, verify the search queries are being executed correctly, and ensure the DDGS search system is returning results that match the actual LDS Church queries rather than São Francisco River content.
Python Code python
from ddgs import DDGS import os import json import time from collections import Counter print('=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH - SIMPLIFIED APPROACH ===') print('Objective: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring/restoring historical properties in 1962') print('Focus: Harmony/Oakland PA area, Susquehanna County, following 1960 Priesthood Restoration Site monument') print('Strategy: Simplified processing to avoid variable scoping issues\n') # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Initialize simplified results storage all_findings = [] all_evidence = [] search_summary = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Identify LDS Church 1962 property acquisition in Harmony/Oakland PA area', 'queries_executed': [], 'total_results_found': 0, 'relevant_results': 0 } # Define focused search queries queries = [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania', '"Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints" 1962 Pennsylvania property', 'Mormon Church 1962 property restoration Pennsylvania Susquehanna County', 'LDS Church Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 Pennsylvania projects', 'Harmony Pennsylvania LDS Church property restoration 1960s', 'Susquehanna County Mormon Church property acquisition 1962' ] print(f'Executing {len(queries)} focused searches:') for i, q in enumerate(queries, 1): print(f' {i}. {q}') # Initialize searcher searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) print('\n=== SEARCH EXECUTION WITH SIMPLIFIED PROCESSING ===') print('=' * 70) # Execute searches with completely simplified approach for i, query in enumerate(queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {i}: {query}') print('-' * 60) try: results = searcher.text( query, max_results=8, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if results: print(f'Found {len(results)} results') search_summary['total_results_found'] += len(results) # Process each result with direct, simple approach for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): # Extract data directly without complex variable handling title_text = result.get('title', '') body_text = result.get('body', '') url_text = result.get('href', '') # Create analysis text directly in one line to avoid scoping issues analysis_text = (title_text + ' ' + body_text).lower() print(f' Result {j}: {len(analysis_text)} chars') # Direct evidence collection without complex variables evidence_found = [] relevance = 0 # Check for LDS Church references if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['lds church', 'church of jesus christ', 'latter-day saints', 'mormon church']): evidence_found.append('LDS Church confirmed') relevance += 10 print(' 🏛️ LDS Church confirmed!') # Check for 1962 date if '1962' in analysis_text: evidence_found.append('1962 date confirmed') relevance += 12 print(' 📅 1962 date confirmed!') # Check for property-related terms if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['property acquisition', 'property restoration', 'historical property', 'property purchase']): evidence_found.append('Property project reference') relevance += 10 print(' 🏠 Property project reference!') # Check for location references if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['harmony', 'oakland']): evidence_found.append('Harmony/Oakland location') relevance += 10 print(' 📍 Harmony/Oakland location!') if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['pennsylvania', 'susquehanna county']): evidence_found.append('Pennsylvania location') relevance += 8 print(' 🗺️ Pennsylvania location!') # Check for Priesthood Restoration Site if 'priesthood restoration' in analysis_text: evidence_found.append('Priesthood Restoration Site') relevance += 10 print(' ⛪ Priesthood Restoration Site!') # Check for 1960s timeframe if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['1960', '1961', '1963', 'early 1960s', '1960s']): evidence_found.append('1960s timeframe') relevance += 6 print(' ⏰ 1960s timeframe!') # Store findings if relevant (score >= 10 or multiple evidence pieces) if relevance >= 10 or len(evidence_found) >= 2: finding = { 'search_number': i, 'result_number': j, 'query': query, 'title': title_text, 'body': body_text[:300], # Truncate for storage 'url': url_text, 'relevance_score': relevance, 'evidence': evidence_found } all_findings.append(finding) all_evidence.extend(evidence_found) search_summary['relevant_results'] += 1 print(f' 📋 STORED: Score {relevance}, Evidence: {", ".join(evidence_found)}') print(f' Title: {title_text[:80]}...') else: print('No results found') search_summary['queries_executed'].append(query) except Exception as e: print(f'Error in search {i}: {str(e)}') search_summary['queries_executed'].append(f'{query} (ERROR: {str(e)})') time.sleep(2) print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('COMPREHENSIVE ANALYSIS RESULTS') print('=' * 80) print(f'Total queries executed: {len(search_summary["queries_executed"])}') print(f'Total results found: {search_summary["total_results_found"]}') print(f'Relevant findings collected: {len(all_findings)}') print(f'Evidence pieces gathered: {len(all_evidence)}') if all_findings: # Sort findings by relevance all_findings.sort(key=lambda x: x['relevance_score'], reverse=True) print('\n📊 TOP FINDINGS BY RELEVANCE:') print('-' * 50) for i, finding in enumerate(all_findings[:5], 1): print(f'\n{i}. Score: {finding["relevance_score"]} | Search: {finding["search_number"]}') print(f' Title: {finding["title"][:100]}...') print(f' URL: {finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(finding["evidence"])}') print(f' Content: {finding["body"][:150]}...') # Count evidence types evidence_counts = Counter(all_evidence) print('\n📈 EVIDENCE FREQUENCY ANALYSIS:') print('-' * 40) for evidence, count in evidence_counts.most_common(): print(f' • {evidence}: {count} occurrences') # Focus area analysis for the PLAN objectives focus_results = { 'LDS Church identified': 'LDS Church confirmed' in all_evidence, '1962 date confirmed': '1962 date confirmed' in all_evidence, 'Property projects found': 'Property project reference' in all_evidence, 'Harmony/Oakland location': 'Harmony/Oakland location' in all_evidence, 'Pennsylvania confirmed': 'Pennsylvania location' in all_evidence, 'Priesthood Restoration connection': 'Priesthood Restoration Site' in all_evidence, '1960s timeframe': '1960s timeframe' in all_evidence } print('\n🔍 PLAN OBJECTIVE ANALYSIS:') print('-' * 40) confirmed_count = 0 for objective, found in focus_results.items(): status = '✅' if found else '❌' print(f'{status} {objective}: {found}') if found: confirmed_count += 1 success_rate = (confirmed_count / len(focus_results)) * 100 print(f'\n📈 RESEARCH SUCCESS RATE: {success_rate:.1f}% ({confirmed_count}/{len(focus_results)} objectives met)') # Extract specific town/location information location_findings = [] for finding in all_findings: if any(loc in finding['evidence'] for loc in ['Harmony/Oakland location', 'Pennsylvania location']): location_info = f"Title: {finding['title']} | Content: {finding['body'][:200]}" location_findings.append(location_info) if location_findings: print('\n📍 SPECIFIC LOCATION INFORMATION:') print('-' * 50) for i, location in enumerate(location_findings[:3], 1): print(f'{i}. {location}...') # Save comprehensive results final_results = { 'research_summary': search_summary, 'success_rate': success_rate, 'focus_objectives': focus_results, 'evidence_frequency': dict(evidence_counts), 'top_findings': all_findings[:10], 'location_specific_findings': location_findings[:5] } results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_final.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(final_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\n💾 Results saved to: {results_file}') # Create detailed summary report summary_report = f'''LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH HARMONY/OAKLAND PENNSYLVANIA AREA FINAL ANALYSIS REPORT Generated: {search_summary["timestamp"]} RESEARCH OBJECTIVE: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring and restoring historical properties in 1962, following their 1960 monument placement at the Priesthood Restoration Site. SEARCH EXECUTION SUMMARY: • Queries executed: {len(search_summary["queries_executed"])} • Total results found: {search_summary["total_results_found"]} • Relevant findings: {len(all_findings)} • Research success rate: {success_rate:.1f}% PLAN OBJECTIVE ANALYSIS: ''' for objective, found in focus_results.items(): status = 'CONFIRMED' if found else 'NOT FOUND' summary_report += f'• {objective}: {status}\n' summary_report += f'''\nEVIDENCE FREQUENCY: ''' for evidence, count in evidence_counts.most_common(): summary_report += f'• {evidence}: {count} mentions\n' summary_report += f'''\nTOP FINDINGS: ''' for i, finding in enumerate(all_findings[:3], 1): summary_report += f'''{i}. {finding["title"]} URL: {finding["url"]} Relevance: {finding["relevance_score"]} Evidence: {", ".join(finding["evidence"])} Content: {finding["body"][:200]}... ''' if location_findings: summary_report += f'''LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS: ''' for i, location in enumerate(location_findings[:3], 1): summary_report += f'{i}. {location}...\n\n' summary_report += f'''FILES GENERATED: • lds_church_1962_research_final.json - Complete research data • lds_church_1962_final_summary.txt - This summary report CONCLUSIONS: ''' if success_rate >= 60: summary_report += 'Research successful - multiple PLAN objectives confirmed\n' elif success_rate >= 40: summary_report += 'Partial success - some PLAN objectives identified\n' else: summary_report += 'Limited success - further targeted research recommended\n' # Save summary report summary_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_final_summary.txt') with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(summary_report) print(f'📋 Summary report saved to: {summary_file}') else: print('❌ No relevant findings collected') # Save empty results for reference empty_results = { 'research_summary': search_summary, 'success_rate': 0, 'message': 'No relevant findings collected' } results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_final.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(empty_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'💾 Empty results saved to: {results_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH COMPLETE') print('=' * 80) if len(all_findings) >= 5: print('✅ RESEARCH SUCCESSFUL - Multiple relevant findings collected') elif len(all_findings) >= 2: print('⚠️ PARTIAL SUCCESS - Some findings collected') else: print('❌ LIMITED SUCCESS - Few or no findings collected') print(f'\n📊 FINAL STATISTICS:') print(f' • Queries executed: {len(search_summary["queries_executed"])}') print(f' • Total results processed: {search_summary["total_results_found"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {len(all_findings)}') print(f' • Evidence pieces: {len(set(all_evidence)) if all_evidence else 0}') if all_evidence: unique_evidence = list(set(all_evidence)) print('\n🎯 EVIDENCE COLLECTED:') for evidence in unique_evidence: print(f' ✅ {evidence}') print('\n=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH COMPLETE ===')
