Python Code python
from ddgs import DDGS import os import json import time from collections import Counter print('=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH - CLEAN RESTART ===') print('Objective: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring/restoring historical properties in 1962') print('Focus: Harmony/Oakland PA area, Susquehanna County, following 1960 Priesthood Restoration Site monument') print('Strategy: Fresh search execution with no cached results\n') # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Initialize fresh results storage research_data = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Identify LDS Church 1962 property acquisition in Harmony/Oakland PA area', 'total_queries': 0, 'successful_searches': 0, 'total_results': 0, 'relevant_findings': [], 'evidence_collected': [] } # Define clean search queries search_queries = [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania', 'Church Jesus Christ Latter-day Saints 1962 Pennsylvania property restoration', 'Mormon Church 1962 property projects Pennsylvania Susquehanna County', 'LDS Church Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 Pennsylvania', 'Harmony Pennsylvania LDS Church property restoration 1960s' ] print(f'Executing {len(search_queries)} clean searches:') for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f' {i}. {query}') # Initialize fresh searcher instance searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) print('\n=== FRESH SEARCH EXECUTION ===') print('=' * 60) # Execute searches with completely fresh approach for search_num, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {search_num}: {query}') print('-' * 50) research_data['total_queries'] += 1 try: # Execute fresh search search_results = searcher.text( query, max_results=8, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if search_results: print(f'Retrieved {len(search_results)} results') research_data['successful_searches'] += 1 research_data['total_results'] += len(search_results) # Process each result with simple, direct analysis for result_num, search_result in enumerate(search_results, 1): # Extract result data directly result_title = search_result.get('title', '') result_body = search_result.get('body', '') result_url = search_result.get('href', '') # Combine text for analysis in one step combined_text = (result_title + ' ' + result_body).lower() print(f' Result {result_num}: {len(combined_text)} characters') # Direct evidence detection evidence_list = [] relevance_points = 0 # Check for LDS Church indicators lds_terms = ['lds church', 'church of jesus christ', 'latter-day saints', 'mormon church'] if any(term in combined_text for term in lds_terms): evidence_list.append('LDS Church confirmed') relevance_points += 10 print(' 🏛️ LDS Church confirmed!') # Check for 1962 date if '1962' in combined_text: evidence_list.append('1962 date confirmed') relevance_points += 12 print(' 📅 1962 date confirmed!') # Check for property terms property_terms = ['property acquisition', 'property restoration', 'historical property', 'property purchase', 'acquired property'] if any(term in combined_text for term in property_terms): evidence_list.append('Property project confirmed') relevance_points += 10 print(' 🏠 Property project confirmed!') # Check for location terms if 'harmony' in combined_text or 'oakland' in combined_text: evidence_list.append('Harmony/Oakland location') relevance_points += 10 print(' 📍 Harmony/Oakland location!') if 'pennsylvania' in combined_text or 'susquehanna county' in combined_text: evidence_list.append('Pennsylvania location') relevance_points += 8 print(' 🗺️ Pennsylvania location!') # Check for Priesthood Restoration if 'priesthood restoration' in combined_text: evidence_list.append('Priesthood Restoration Site') relevance_points += 10 print(' ⛪ Priesthood Restoration Site!') # Check for 1960s timeframe timeframe_terms = ['1960', '1961', '1963', '1960s', 'early 1960s'] if any(term in combined_text for term in timeframe_terms): evidence_list.append('1960s timeframe') relevance_points += 6 print(' ⏰ 1960s timeframe!') # Store relevant findings if relevance_points >= 10 or len(evidence_list) >= 2: finding_data = { 'search_number': search_num, 'result_number': result_num, 'query_used': query, 'title': result_title, 'body_excerpt': result_body[:250], 'url': result_url, 'relevance_score': relevance_points, 'evidence_found': evidence_list } research_data['relevant_findings'].append(finding_data) research_data['evidence_collected'].extend(evidence_list) print(f' 📋 RELEVANT FINDING: Score {relevance_points}') print(f' Evidence: {', '.join(evidence_list)}') print(f' Title: {result_title[:80]}...') else: print('No results returned') except Exception as search_error: print(f'Search error: {str(search_error)}') # Brief pause between searches time.sleep(2) print('\n' + '=' * 70) print('RESEARCH ANALYSIS RESULTS') print('=' * 70) print(f'Search execution summary:') print(f' • Queries attempted: {research_data["total_queries"]}') print(f' • Successful searches: {research_data["successful_searches"]}') print(f' • Total results processed: {research_data["total_results"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {len(research_data["relevant_findings"])}') print(f' • Evidence pieces: {len(research_data["evidence_collected"])}') if research_data['relevant_findings']: # Sort findings by relevance sorted_findings = sorted(research_data['relevant_findings'], key=lambda x: x['relevance_score'], reverse=True) print('\n📊 TOP RELEVANT FINDINGS:') print('-' * 40) for i, finding in enumerate(sorted_findings[:5], 1): print(f'\n{i}. Relevance Score: {finding["relevance_score"]}') print(f' Title: {finding["title"][:100]}...') print(f' URL: {finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {', '.join(finding["evidence_found"])}') print(f' Content: {finding["body_excerpt"][:120]}...') # Analyze evidence frequency evidence_frequency = Counter(research_data['evidence_collected']) print('\n📈 EVIDENCE FREQUENCY:') print('-' * 30) for evidence_type, count in evidence_frequency.most_common(): print(f' • {evidence_type}: {count} occurrences') # PLAN objective assessment plan_objectives = { 'LDS Church identified': 'LDS Church confirmed' in research_data['evidence_collected'], '1962 date confirmed': '1962 date confirmed' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Property projects found': 'Property project confirmed' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Harmony/Oakland location': 'Harmony/Oakland location' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Pennsylvania confirmed': 'Pennsylvania location' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Priesthood Restoration connection': 'Priesthood Restoration Site' in research_data['evidence_collected'], '1960s timeframe confirmed': '1960s timeframe' in research_data['evidence_collected'] } print('\n🎯 PLAN OBJECTIVE ASSESSMENT:') print('-' * 35) objectives_met = 0 for objective, achieved in plan_objectives.items(): status = '✅' if achieved else '❌' print(f'{status} {objective}: {achieved}') if achieved: objectives_met += 1 success_percentage = (objectives_met / len(plan_objectives)) * 100 print(f'\n📈 PLAN SUCCESS RATE: {success_percentage:.1f}% ({objectives_met}/{len(plan_objectives)} objectives met)') # Extract location-specific information location_specific = [] for finding in sorted_findings: if any(loc_evidence in finding['evidence_found'] for loc_evidence in ['Harmony/Oakland location', 'Pennsylvania location']): location_info = { 'title': finding['title'], 'url': finding['url'], 'content': finding['body_excerpt'], 'evidence': finding['evidence_found'] } location_specific.append(location_info) if location_specific: print('\n📍 LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS:') print('-' * 40) for i, loc_finding in enumerate(location_specific[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. {loc_finding["title"][:80]}...') print(f' URL: {loc_finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {', '.join(loc_finding["evidence"])}') print(f' Content: {loc_finding["content"][:150]}...') # Save comprehensive results final_research_data = { 'research_summary': research_data, 'plan_success_rate': success_percentage, 'plan_objectives': plan_objectives, 'evidence_analysis': dict(evidence_frequency), 'top_findings': sorted_findings[:8], 'location_specific_findings': location_specific[:5] } results_filename = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_clean.json') with open(results_filename, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(final_research_data, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\n💾 Research results saved to: {results_filename}') # Create summary report summary_text = f'''LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH HARMONY/OAKLAND PENNSYLVANIA AREA - CLEAN EXECUTION Generated: {research_data["timestamp"]} RESEARCH OBJECTIVE: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring and restoring historical properties in 1962, following their 1960 monument placement at the Priesthood Restoration Site. EXECUTION SUMMARY: • Queries executed: {research_data["total_queries"]} • Successful searches: {research_data["successful_searches"]} • Results processed: {research_data["total_results"]} • Relevant findings: {len(research_data["relevant_findings"])} • PLAN success rate: {success_percentage:.1f}% PLAN OBJECTIVE RESULTS: ''' for objective, achieved in plan_objectives.items(): status = 'ACHIEVED' if achieved else 'NOT FOUND' summary_text += f'• {objective}: {status}\n' summary_text += f'''\nEVIDENCE ANALYSIS: ''' for evidence_type, count in evidence_frequency.most_common(): summary_text += f'• {evidence_type}: {count} mentions\n' summary_text += f'''\nTOP FINDINGS: ''' for i, finding in enumerate(sorted_findings[:3], 1): summary_text += f'''{i}. {finding["title"]} URL: {finding["url"]} Relevance: {finding["relevance_score"]} Evidence: {', '.join(finding["evidence_found"])} Content: {finding["body_excerpt"][:200]}... ''' if location_specific: summary_text += f'''LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS: ''' for i, loc_finding in enumerate(location_specific[:2], 1): summary_text += f'{i}. {loc_finding["title"]}\n {loc_finding["content"][:200]}...\n\n' summary_text += f'''FILES GENERATED: • lds_church_1962_research_clean.json - Complete research data • lds_church_1962_clean_summary.txt - This summary report CONCLUSIONS: ''' if success_percentage >= 60: summary_text += 'Research successful - multiple PLAN objectives achieved\n' elif success_percentage >= 40: summary_text += 'Partial success - some PLAN objectives identified\n' else: summary_text += 'Limited success - further research approaches needed\n' summary_filename = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_clean_summary.txt') with open(summary_filename, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(summary_text) print(f'📋 Summary report saved to: {summary_filename}') else: print('\n❌ No relevant findings collected') # Save empty results empty_data = { 'research_summary': research_data, 'plan_success_rate': 0, 'message': 'No relevant findings collected' } results_filename = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_clean.json') with open(results_filename, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(empty_data, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'💾 Empty results saved to: {results_filename}') print('\n' + '=' * 70) print('LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH COMPLETE') print('=' * 70) if len(research_data['relevant_findings']) >= 3: print('✅ RESEARCH SUCCESSFUL - Multiple relevant findings') elif len(research_data['relevant_findings']) >= 1: print('⚠️ PARTIAL SUCCESS - Some findings collected') else: print('❌ LIMITED SUCCESS - No relevant findings') print(f'\n📊 FINAL EXECUTION STATISTICS:') print(f' • Total queries: {research_data["total_queries"]}') print(f' • Successful searches: {research_data["successful_searches"]}') print(f' • Results processed: {research_data["total_results"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {len(research_data["relevant_findings"])}') print(f' • Unique evidence types: {len(set(research_data["evidence_collected"]))}') if research_data['evidence_collected']: unique_evidence = list(set(research_data['evidence_collected'])) print('\n🎯 EVIDENCE TYPES FOUND:') for evidence in unique_evidence: print(f' ✅ {evidence}') print('\n=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH EXECUTION COMPLETE ===')
Execution Output
Code Output: === LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH - CLEAN RESTART === Objective: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring/restoring historical properties in 1962 Focus: Harmony/Oakland PA area, Susquehanna County, following 1960 Priesthood Restoration Site monument Strategy: Fresh search execution with no cached results Executing 5 clean searches: 1. LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania 2. Church Jesus Christ Latter-day Saints 1962 Pennsylvania property restoration 3. Mormon Church 1962 property projects Pennsylvania Susquehanna County 4. LDS Church Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 Pennsylvania 5. 2025-08-12 06:34:01
Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - The code encountered the same critical variable scoping error that has persisted across multiple attempts. Despite the simplified approach, the error 'name 'combined_text' is not defined' occurred during the first search result processing, preventing any analysis from completing. The searches executed successfully (5 queries found 8 results each = 40 total results), but the variable definition issue blocked all result processing. **PLAN** completion: 0% - no search results were analyzed, no LDS Church 1962 property acquisition evidence was collected, and no historical indicators were identified. The code did save empty result files to workspace. **Critical issue**: The variable scoping problem appears to be a fundamental code structure issue that needs to be completely rewritten. The 'combined_text' variable (now called 'analysis_text' in the latest version) is still not being defined before use. **Recommended solution**: Completely restructure the result processing loop to define ALL variables at the very beginning of each iteration, with explicit error handling around each variable assignment to identify exactly where the scoping failure occurs.
Python Code python
from ddgs import DDGS import os import json import time from collections import Counter print('=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH - CLEAN RESTART ===') print('Objective: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring/restoring historical properties in 1962') print('Focus: Harmony/Oakland PA area, Susquehanna County, following 1960 Priesthood Restoration Site monument') print('Strategy: Fresh search execution with no cached results\n') # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Initialize fresh results storage research_data = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Identify LDS Church 1962 property acquisition in Harmony/Oakland PA area', 'total_queries': 0, 'successful_searches': 0, 'total_results': 0, 'relevant_findings': [], 'evidence_collected': [] } # Define clean search queries search_queries = [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania', 'Church Jesus Christ Latter-day Saints 1962 Pennsylvania property restoration', 'Mormon Church 1962 property projects Pennsylvania Susquehanna County', 'LDS Church Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 Pennsylvania', 'Harmony Pennsylvania LDS Church property restoration 1960s' ] print(f'Executing {len(search_queries)} clean searches:') for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f' {i}. {query}') # Initialize fresh searcher instance searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) print('\n=== FRESH SEARCH EXECUTION ===') print('=' * 60) # Execute searches with completely fresh approach for search_num, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {search_num}: {query}') print('-' * 50) research_data['total_queries'] += 1 try: # Execute fresh search search_results = searcher.text( query, max_results=8, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if search_results: print(f'Retrieved {len(search_results)} results') research_data['successful_searches'] += 1 research_data['total_results'] += len(search_results) # Process each result with simple, direct analysis for result_num, search_result in enumerate(search_results, 1): # Extract result data directly result_title = search_result.get('title', '') result_body = search_result.get('body', '') result_url = search_result.get('href', '') # Combine text for analysis in one step combined_text = (result_title + ' ' + result_body).lower() print(f' Result {result_num}: {len(combined_text)} characters') # Direct evidence detection evidence_list = [] relevance_points = 0 # Check for LDS Church indicators lds_terms = ['lds church', 'church of jesus christ', 'latter-day saints', 'mormon church'] if any(term in combined_text for term in lds_terms): evidence_list.append('LDS Church confirmed') relevance_points += 10 print(' 🏛️ LDS Church confirmed!') # Check for 1962 date if '1962' in combined_text: evidence_list.append('1962 date confirmed') relevance_points += 12 print(' 📅 1962 date confirmed!') # Check for property terms property_terms = ['property acquisition', 'property restoration', 'historical property', 'property purchase', 'acquired property'] if any(term in combined_text for term in property_terms): evidence_list.append('Property project confirmed') relevance_points += 10 print(' 🏠 Property project confirmed!') # Check for location terms if 'harmony' in combined_text or 'oakland' in combined_text: evidence_list.append('Harmony/Oakland location') relevance_points += 10 print(' 📍 Harmony/Oakland location!') if 'pennsylvania' in combined_text or 'susquehanna county' in combined_text: evidence_list.append('Pennsylvania location') relevance_points += 8 print(' 🗺️ Pennsylvania location!') # Check for Priesthood Restoration if 'priesthood restoration' in combined_text: evidence_list.append('Priesthood Restoration Site') relevance_points += 10 print(' ⛪ Priesthood Restoration Site!') # Check for 1960s timeframe timeframe_terms = ['1960', '1961', '1963', '1960s', 'early 1960s'] if any(term in combined_text for term in timeframe_terms): evidence_list.append('1960s timeframe') relevance_points += 6 print(' ⏰ 1960s timeframe!') # Store relevant findings if relevance_points >= 10 or len(evidence_list) >= 2: finding_data = { 'search_number': search_num, 'result_number': result_num, 'query_used': query, 'title': result_title, 'body_excerpt': result_body[:250], 'url': result_url, 'relevance_score': relevance_points, 'evidence_found': evidence_list } research_data['relevant_findings'].append(finding_data) research_data['evidence_collected'].extend(evidence_list) print(f' 📋 RELEVANT FINDING: Score {relevance_points}') print(f' Evidence: {', '.join(evidence_list)}') print(f' Title: {result_title[:80]}...') else: print('No results returned') except Exception as search_error: print(f'Search error: {str(search_error)}') # Brief pause between searches time.sleep(2) print('\n' + '=' * 70) print('RESEARCH ANALYSIS RESULTS') print('=' * 70) print(f'Search execution summary:') print(f' • Queries attempted: {research_data["total_queries"]}') print(f' • Successful searches: {research_data["successful_searches"]}') print(f' • Total results processed: {research_data["total_results"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {len(research_data["relevant_findings"])}') print(f' • Evidence pieces: {len(research_data["evidence_collected"])}') if research_data['relevant_findings']: # Sort findings by relevance sorted_findings = sorted(research_data['relevant_findings'], key=lambda x: x['relevance_score'], reverse=True) print('\n📊 TOP RELEVANT FINDINGS:') print('-' * 40) for i, finding in enumerate(sorted_findings[:5], 1): print(f'\n{i}. Relevance Score: {finding["relevance_score"]}') print(f' Title: {finding["title"][:100]}...') print(f' URL: {finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {', '.join(finding["evidence_found"])}') print(f' Content: {finding["body_excerpt"][:120]}...') # Analyze evidence frequency evidence_frequency = Counter(research_data['evidence_collected']) print('\n📈 EVIDENCE FREQUENCY:') print('-' * 30) for evidence_type, count in evidence_frequency.most_common(): print(f' • {evidence_type}: {count} occurrences') # PLAN objective assessment plan_objectives = { 'LDS Church identified': 'LDS Church confirmed' in research_data['evidence_collected'], '1962 date confirmed': '1962 date confirmed' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Property projects found': 'Property project confirmed' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Harmony/Oakland location': 'Harmony/Oakland location' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Pennsylvania confirmed': 'Pennsylvania location' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Priesthood Restoration connection': 'Priesthood Restoration Site' in research_data['evidence_collected'], '1960s timeframe confirmed': '1960s timeframe' in research_data['evidence_collected'] } print('\n🎯 PLAN OBJECTIVE ASSESSMENT:') print('-' * 35) objectives_met = 0 for objective, achieved in plan_objectives.items(): status = '✅' if achieved else '❌' print(f'{status} {objective}: {achieved}') if achieved: objectives_met += 1 success_percentage = (objectives_met / len(plan_objectives)) * 100 print(f'\n📈 PLAN SUCCESS RATE: {success_percentage:.1f}% ({objectives_met}/{len(plan_objectives)} objectives met)') # Extract location-specific information location_specific = [] for finding in sorted_findings: if any(loc_evidence in finding['evidence_found'] for loc_evidence in ['Harmony/Oakland location', 'Pennsylvania location']): location_info = { 'title': finding['title'], 'url': finding['url'], 'content': finding['body_excerpt'], 'evidence': finding['evidence_found'] } location_specific.append(location_info) if location_specific: print('\n📍 LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS:') print('-' * 40) for i, loc_finding in enumerate(location_specific[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. {loc_finding["title"][:80]}...') print(f' URL: {loc_finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {', '.join(loc_finding["evidence"])}') print(f' Content: {loc_finding["content"][:150]}...') # Save comprehensive results final_research_data = { 'research_summary': research_data, 'plan_success_rate': success_percentage, 'plan_objectives': plan_objectives, 'evidence_analysis': dict(evidence_frequency), 'top_findings': sorted_findings[:8], 'location_specific_findings': location_specific[:5] } results_filename = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_clean.json') with open(results_filename, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(final_research_data, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\n💾 Research results saved to: {results_filename}') # Create summary report summary_text = f'''LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH HARMONY/OAKLAND PENNSYLVANIA AREA - CLEAN EXECUTION Generated: {research_data["timestamp"]} RESEARCH OBJECTIVE: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring and restoring historical properties in 1962, following their 1960 monument placement at the Priesthood Restoration Site. EXECUTION SUMMARY: • Queries executed: {research_data["total_queries"]} • Successful searches: {research_data["successful_searches"]} • Results processed: {research_data["total_results"]} • Relevant findings: {len(research_data["relevant_findings"])} • PLAN success rate: {success_percentage:.1f}% PLAN OBJECTIVE RESULTS: ''' for objective, achieved in plan_objectives.items(): status = 'ACHIEVED' if achieved else 'NOT FOUND' summary_text += f'• {objective}: {status}\n' summary_text += f'''\nEVIDENCE ANALYSIS: ''' for evidence_type, count in evidence_frequency.most_common(): summary_text += f'• {evidence_type}: {count} mentions\n' summary_text += f'''\nTOP FINDINGS: ''' for i, finding in enumerate(sorted_findings[:3], 1): summary_text += f'''{i}. {finding["title"]} URL: {finding["url"]} Relevance: {finding["relevance_score"]} Evidence: {', '.join(finding["evidence_found"])} Content: {finding["body_excerpt"][:200]}... ''' if location_specific: summary_text += f'''LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS: ''' for i, loc_finding in enumerate(location_specific[:2], 1): summary_text += f'{i}. {loc_finding["title"]}\n {loc_finding["content"][:200]}...\n\n' summary_text += f'''FILES GENERATED: • lds_church_1962_research_clean.json - Complete research data • lds_church_1962_clean_summary.txt - This summary report CONCLUSIONS: ''' if success_percentage >= 60: summary_text += 'Research successful - multiple PLAN objectives achieved\n' elif success_percentage >= 40: summary_text += 'Partial success - some PLAN objectives identified\n' else: summary_text += 'Limited success - further research approaches needed\n' summary_filename = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_clean_summary.txt') with open(summary_filename, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(summary_text) print(f'📋 Summary report saved to: {summary_filename}') else: print('\n❌ No relevant findings collected') # Save empty results empty_data = { 'research_summary': research_data, 'plan_success_rate': 0, 'message': 'No relevant findings collected' } results_filename = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_clean.json') with open(results_filename, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(empty_data, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'💾 Empty results saved to: {results_filename}') print('\n' + '=' * 70) print('LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH COMPLETE') print('=' * 70) if len(research_data['relevant_findings']) >= 3: print('✅ RESEARCH SUCCESSFUL - Multiple relevant findings') elif len(research_data['relevant_findings']) >= 1: print('⚠️ PARTIAL SUCCESS - Some findings collected') else: print('❌ LIMITED SUCCESS - No relevant findings') print(f'\n📊 FINAL EXECUTION STATISTICS:') print(f' • Total queries: {research_data["total_queries"]}') print(f' • Successful searches: {research_data["successful_searches"]}') print(f' • Results processed: {research_data["total_results"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {len(research_data["relevant_findings"])}') print(f' • Unique evidence types: {len(set(research_data["evidence_collected"]))}') if research_data['evidence_collected']: unique_evidence = list(set(research_data['evidence_collected'])) print('\n🎯 EVIDENCE TYPES FOUND:') for evidence in unique_evidence: print(f' ✅ {evidence}') print('\n=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH EXECUTION COMPLETE ===')

Python Code python
from ddgs import DDGS import os import json import time from collections import Counter print('=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH - RESTRUCTURED APPROACH ===') print('Objective: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring/restoring historical properties in 1962') print('Focus: Harmony/Oakland PA area, Susquehanna County, following 1960 Priesthood Restoration Site monument') print('Strategy: Completely restructured variable handling to eliminate scoping errors\n') # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Initialize research tracking research_summary = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Identify LDS Church 1962 property acquisition in Harmony/Oakland PA area', 'queries_attempted': 0, 'successful_searches': 0, 'total_results_found': 0, 'relevant_findings_count': 0 } # Storage for findings all_findings = [] all_evidence = [] # Define search queries queries = [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania', 'Church Jesus Christ Latter-day Saints 1962 Pennsylvania property restoration', 'Mormon Church 1962 property projects Pennsylvania Susquehanna County', 'LDS Church Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 Pennsylvania', 'Harmony Pennsylvania LDS Church property restoration 1960s' ] print(f'Executing {len(queries)} searches:') for i, query in enumerate(queries, 1): print(f' {i}. {query}') # Initialize searcher searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) print('\n=== RESTRUCTURED SEARCH EXECUTION ===') print('=' * 60) # Execute searches with completely restructured processing for query_index, search_query in enumerate(queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {query_index}: {search_query}') print('-' * 50) research_summary['queries_attempted'] += 1 try: # Execute search results = searcher.text( search_query, max_results=8, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if results: print(f'Retrieved {len(results)} results') research_summary['successful_searches'] += 1 research_summary['total_results_found'] += len(results) # Process each result with explicit variable definition for result_index, single_result in enumerate(results, 1): print(f' Processing result {result_index}...') # CRITICAL FIX: Define ALL variables explicitly at the start try: # Extract basic data with explicit error handling title_data = single_result.get('title', '') body_data = single_result.get('body', '') url_data = single_result.get('href', '') # Create analysis text with explicit definition text_for_analysis = str(title_data) + ' ' + str(body_data) text_lowercase = text_for_analysis.lower() print(f' Text length: {len(text_lowercase)} characters') # Initialize evidence tracking evidence_items = [] relevance_score = 0 # Check for LDS Church terms lds_indicators = ['lds church', 'church of jesus christ', 'latter-day saints', 'mormon church'] for lds_term in lds_indicators: if lds_term in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('LDS Church confirmed') relevance_score += 10 print(' 🏛️ LDS Church confirmed!') break # Check for 1962 date if '1962' in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('1962 date confirmed') relevance_score += 12 print(' 📅 1962 date confirmed!') # Check for property terms property_indicators = ['property acquisition', 'property restoration', 'historical property', 'property purchase', 'acquired property'] for prop_term in property_indicators: if prop_term in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('Property project confirmed') relevance_score += 10 print(' 🏠 Property project confirmed!') break # Check for location terms if 'harmony' in text_lowercase or 'oakland' in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('Harmony/Oakland location') relevance_score += 10 print(' 📍 Harmony/Oakland location!') if 'pennsylvania' in text_lowercase or 'susquehanna county' in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('Pennsylvania location') relevance_score += 8 print(' 🗺️ Pennsylvania location!') # Check for Priesthood Restoration if 'priesthood restoration' in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('Priesthood Restoration Site') relevance_score += 10 print(' ⛪ Priesthood Restoration Site!') # Check for 1960s timeframe timeframe_indicators = ['1960', '1961', '1963', '1960s', 'early 1960s'] for time_term in timeframe_indicators: if time_term in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('1960s timeframe') relevance_score += 6 print(' ⏰ 1960s timeframe!') break # Store relevant findings if relevance_score >= 10 or len(evidence_items) >= 2: finding_record = { 'search_number': query_index, 'result_number': result_index, 'query': search_query, 'title': title_data, 'body_excerpt': body_data[:250], 'url': url_data, 'relevance_score': relevance_score, 'evidence': evidence_items } all_findings.append(finding_record) all_evidence.extend(evidence_items) research_summary['relevant_findings_count'] += 1 print(f' 📋 RELEVANT: Score {relevance_score}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(evidence_items)}') print(f' Title: {title_data[:80]}...') except Exception as processing_error: print(f' ❌ Error processing result {result_index}: {str(processing_error)}') continue else: print('No results returned') except Exception as search_error: print(f'Search error: {str(search_error)}') # Brief pause time.sleep(2) print('\n' + '=' * 70) print('RESEARCH RESULTS ANALYSIS') print('=' * 70) print(f'Execution Summary:') print(f' • Queries attempted: {research_summary["queries_attempted"]}') print(f' • Successful searches: {research_summary["successful_searches"]}') print(f' • Total results found: {research_summary["total_results_found"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {research_summary["relevant_findings_count"]}') print(f' • Evidence pieces collected: {len(all_evidence)}') if all_findings: # Sort by relevance sorted_findings = sorted(all_findings, key=lambda x: x['relevance_score'], reverse=True) print('\n📊 TOP RELEVANT FINDINGS:') print('-' * 40) for i, finding in enumerate(sorted_findings[:5], 1): print(f'\n{i}. Relevance Score: {finding["relevance_score"]}') print(f' Title: {finding["title"][:100]}...') print(f' URL: {finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(finding["evidence"])}') print(f' Content: {finding["body_excerpt"][:120]}...') # Evidence analysis evidence_counts = Counter(all_evidence) print('\n📈 EVIDENCE FREQUENCY:') print('-' * 30) for evidence_type, count in evidence_counts.most_common(): print(f' • {evidence_type}: {count} occurrences') # PLAN objectives assessment plan_goals = { 'LDS Church identified': 'LDS Church confirmed' in all_evidence, '1962 date confirmed': '1962 date confirmed' in all_evidence, 'Property projects found': 'Property project confirmed' in all_evidence, 'Harmony/Oakland location': 'Harmony/Oakland location' in all_evidence, 'Pennsylvania confirmed': 'Pennsylvania location' in all_evidence, 'Priesthood Restoration connection': 'Priesthood Restoration Site' in all_evidence, '1960s timeframe confirmed': '1960s timeframe' in all_evidence } print('\n🎯 PLAN OBJECTIVES ASSESSMENT:') print('-' * 35) goals_achieved = 0 for goal, achieved in plan_goals.items(): status = '✅' if achieved else '❌' print(f'{status} {goal}: {achieved}') if achieved: goals_achieved += 1 success_rate = (goals_achieved / len(plan_goals)) * 100 print(f'\n📈 PLAN SUCCESS RATE: {success_rate:.1f}% ({goals_achieved}/{len(plan_goals)} objectives achieved)') # Location-specific findings location_findings = [] for finding in sorted_findings: if any(loc in finding['evidence'] for loc in ['Harmony/Oakland location', 'Pennsylvania location']): location_findings.append(finding) if location_findings: print('\n📍 LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS:') print('-' * 40) for i, loc_finding in enumerate(location_findings[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. {loc_finding["title"][:80]}...') print(f' URL: {loc_finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(loc_finding["evidence"])}') print(f' Content: {loc_finding["body_excerpt"][:150]}...') # Save results final_results = { 'research_summary': research_summary, 'plan_success_rate': success_rate, 'plan_objectives': plan_goals, 'evidence_analysis': dict(evidence_counts), 'top_findings': sorted_findings[:8], 'location_findings': location_findings[:5] } results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_final.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(final_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\n💾 Results saved to: {results_file}') # Create summary report summary_content = f'''LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH HARMONY/OAKLAND PENNSYLVANIA AREA - FINAL RESULTS Generated: {research_summary["timestamp"]} RESEARCH OBJECTIVE: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring and restoring historical properties in 1962, following their 1960 monument placement at the Priesthood Restoration Site. EXECUTION SUMMARY: • Queries attempted: {research_summary["queries_attempted"]} • Successful searches: {research_summary["successful_searches"]} • Results processed: {research_summary["total_results_found"]} • Relevant findings: {research_summary["relevant_findings_count"]} • PLAN success rate: {success_rate:.1f}% PLAN OBJECTIVES RESULTS: ''' for goal, achieved in plan_goals.items(): status = 'ACHIEVED' if achieved else 'NOT FOUND' summary_content += f'• {goal}: {status}\n' summary_content += f'''\nEVIDENCE ANALYSIS: ''' for evidence_type, count in evidence_counts.most_common(): summary_content += f'• {evidence_type}: {count} mentions\n' summary_content += f'''\nTOP FINDINGS: ''' for i, finding in enumerate(sorted_findings[:3], 1): summary_content += f'''{i}. {finding["title"]} URL: {finding["url"]} Relevance: {finding["relevance_score"]} Evidence: {", ".join(finding["evidence"])} Content: {finding["body_excerpt"][:200]}... ''' if location_findings: summary_content += f'''LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS: ''' for i, loc_finding in enumerate(location_findings[:2], 1): summary_content += f'{i}. {loc_finding["title"]}\n {loc_finding["body_excerpt"][:200]}...\n\n' summary_content += f'''FILES GENERATED: • lds_church_1962_research_final.json - Complete research data • lds_church_1962_final_summary.txt - This summary report CONCLUSIONS: ''' if success_rate >= 60: summary_content += 'Research successful - multiple PLAN objectives achieved\n' elif success_rate >= 40: summary_content += 'Partial success - some PLAN objectives identified\n' else: summary_content += 'Limited success - further research approaches needed\n' summary_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_final_summary.txt') with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(summary_content) print(f'📋 Summary report saved to: {summary_file}') else: print('\n❌ No relevant findings collected') # Save empty results empty_results = { 'research_summary': research_summary, 'plan_success_rate': 0, 'message': 'No relevant findings collected' } results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_final.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(empty_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'💾 Empty results saved to: {results_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 70) print('LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH COMPLETE') print('=' * 70) if research_summary['relevant_findings_count'] >= 3: print('✅ RESEARCH SUCCESSFUL - Multiple relevant findings') elif research_summary['relevant_findings_count'] >= 1: print('⚠️ PARTIAL SUCCESS - Some findings collected') else: print('❌ LIMITED SUCCESS - No relevant findings') print(f'\n📊 FINAL STATISTICS:') print(f' • Queries executed: {research_summary["queries_attempted"]}') print(f' • Successful searches: {research_summary["successful_searches"]}') print(f' • Results processed: {research_summary["total_results_found"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {research_summary["relevant_findings_count"]}') print(f' • Evidence types found: {len(set(all_evidence))}') if all_evidence: unique_evidence = list(set(all_evidence)) print('\n🎯 EVIDENCE TYPES COLLECTED:') for evidence in unique_evidence: print(f' ✅ {evidence}') print('\n=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH EXECUTION COMPLETE ===')

Execution failed - The code has a critical and persistent variable scoping error that has now occurred across multiple implementation attempts. The error 'name 'combined_text' is not defined' (and previously 'full_text' and 'analysis_text') prevents any search result processing from completing. While all searches execute successfully (5 queries × 8 results = 40 total results found), the variable definition issue blocks 100% of result analysis. **PLAN** completion: 0% - no LDS Church information, 1962 dates, property acquisition data, or Pennsylvania location details were extracted from any search results. The fundamental problem appears to be in the result processing loop structure where text analysis variables are referenced before proper definition. **Critical fix needed**: Completely rewrite the result processing section with explicit variable definitions at the start of each loop iteration, add try-catch blocks around variable assignments to isolate the exact failure point, and ensure all text analysis variables are defined before any conditional logic that references them. The current approach of moving variable definitions hasn't resolved the underlying scoping issue that prevents the **PLAN** from being executed.
Python Code python
from ddgs import DDGS import os import json import time from collections import Counter print('=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH - RESTRUCTURED APPROACH ===') print('Objective: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring/restoring historical properties in 1962') print('Focus: Harmony/Oakland PA area, Susquehanna County, following 1960 Priesthood Restoration Site monument') print('Strategy: Completely restructured variable handling to eliminate scoping errors\n') # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Initialize research tracking research_summary = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Identify LDS Church 1962 property acquisition in Harmony/Oakland PA area', 'queries_attempted': 0, 'successful_searches': 0, 'total_results_found': 0, 'relevant_findings_count': 0 } # Storage for findings all_findings = [] all_evidence = [] # Define search queries queries = [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania', 'Church Jesus Christ Latter-day Saints 1962 Pennsylvania property restoration', 'Mormon Church 1962 property projects Pennsylvania Susquehanna County', 'LDS Church Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 Pennsylvania', 'Harmony Pennsylvania LDS Church property restoration 1960s' ] print(f'Executing {len(queries)} searches:') for i, query in enumerate(queries, 1): print(f' {i}. {query}') # Initialize searcher searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) print('\n=== RESTRUCTURED SEARCH EXECUTION ===') print('=' * 60) # Execute searches with completely restructured processing for query_index, search_query in enumerate(queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {query_index}: {search_query}') print('-' * 50) research_summary['queries_attempted'] += 1 try: # Execute search results = searcher.text( search_query, max_results=8, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if results: print(f'Retrieved {len(results)} results') research_summary['successful_searches'] += 1 research_summary['total_results_found'] += len(results) # Process each result with explicit variable definition for result_index, single_result in enumerate(results, 1): print(f' Processing result {result_index}...') # CRITICAL FIX: Define ALL variables explicitly at the start try: # Extract basic data with explicit error handling title_data = single_result.get('title', '') body_data = single_result.get('body', '') url_data = single_result.get('href', '') # Create analysis text with explicit definition text_for_analysis = str(title_data) + ' ' + str(body_data) text_lowercase = text_for_analysis.lower() print(f' Text length: {len(text_lowercase)} characters') # Initialize evidence tracking evidence_items = [] relevance_score = 0 # Check for LDS Church terms lds_indicators = ['lds church', 'church of jesus christ', 'latter-day saints', 'mormon church'] for lds_term in lds_indicators: if lds_term in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('LDS Church confirmed') relevance_score += 10 print(' 🏛️ LDS Church confirmed!') break # Check for 1962 date if '1962' in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('1962 date confirmed') relevance_score += 12 print(' 📅 1962 date confirmed!') # Check for property terms property_indicators = ['property acquisition', 'property restoration', 'historical property', 'property purchase', 'acquired property'] for prop_term in property_indicators: if prop_term in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('Property project confirmed') relevance_score += 10 print(' 🏠 Property project confirmed!') break # Check for location terms if 'harmony' in text_lowercase or 'oakland' in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('Harmony/Oakland location') relevance_score += 10 print(' 📍 Harmony/Oakland location!') if 'pennsylvania' in text_lowercase or 'susquehanna county' in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('Pennsylvania location') relevance_score += 8 print(' 🗺️ Pennsylvania location!') # Check for Priesthood Restoration if 'priesthood restoration' in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('Priesthood Restoration Site') relevance_score += 10 print(' ⛪ Priesthood Restoration Site!') # Check for 1960s timeframe timeframe_indicators = ['1960', '1961', '1963', '1960s', 'early 1960s'] for time_term in timeframe_indicators: if time_term in text_lowercase: evidence_items.append('1960s timeframe') relevance_score += 6 print(' ⏰ 1960s timeframe!') break # Store relevant findings if relevance_score >= 10 or len(evidence_items) >= 2: finding_record = { 'search_number': query_index, 'result_number': result_index, 'query': search_query, 'title': title_data, 'body_excerpt': body_data[:250], 'url': url_data, 'relevance_score': relevance_score, 'evidence': evidence_items } all_findings.append(finding_record) all_evidence.extend(evidence_items) research_summary['relevant_findings_count'] += 1 print(f' 📋 RELEVANT: Score {relevance_score}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(evidence_items)}') print(f' Title: {title_data[:80]}...') except Exception as processing_error: print(f' ❌ Error processing result {result_index}: {str(processing_error)}') continue else: print('No results returned') except Exception as search_error: print(f'Search error: {str(search_error)}') # Brief pause time.sleep(2) print('\n' + '=' * 70) print('RESEARCH RESULTS ANALYSIS') print('=' * 70) print(f'Execution Summary:') print(f' • Queries attempted: {research_summary["queries_attempted"]}') print(f' • Successful searches: {research_summary["successful_searches"]}') print(f' • Total results found: {research_summary["total_results_found"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {research_summary["relevant_findings_count"]}') print(f' • Evidence pieces collected: {len(all_evidence)}') if all_findings: # Sort by relevance sorted_findings = sorted(all_findings, key=lambda x: x['relevance_score'], reverse=True) print('\n📊 TOP RELEVANT FINDINGS:') print('-' * 40) for i, finding in enumerate(sorted_findings[:5], 1): print(f'\n{i}. Relevance Score: {finding["relevance_score"]}') print(f' Title: {finding["title"][:100]}...') print(f' URL: {finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(finding["evidence"])}') print(f' Content: {finding["body_excerpt"][:120]}...') # Evidence analysis evidence_counts = Counter(all_evidence) print('\n📈 EVIDENCE FREQUENCY:') print('-' * 30) for evidence_type, count in evidence_counts.most_common(): print(f' • {evidence_type}: {count} occurrences') # PLAN objectives assessment plan_goals = { 'LDS Church identified': 'LDS Church confirmed' in all_evidence, '1962 date confirmed': '1962 date confirmed' in all_evidence, 'Property projects found': 'Property project confirmed' in all_evidence, 'Harmony/Oakland location': 'Harmony/Oakland location' in all_evidence, 'Pennsylvania confirmed': 'Pennsylvania location' in all_evidence, 'Priesthood Restoration connection': 'Priesthood Restoration Site' in all_evidence, '1960s timeframe confirmed': '1960s timeframe' in all_evidence } print('\n🎯 PLAN OBJECTIVES ASSESSMENT:') print('-' * 35) goals_achieved = 0 for goal, achieved in plan_goals.items(): status = '✅' if achieved else '❌' print(f'{status} {goal}: {achieved}') if achieved: goals_achieved += 1 success_rate = (goals_achieved / len(plan_goals)) * 100 print(f'\n📈 PLAN SUCCESS RATE: {success_rate:.1f}% ({goals_achieved}/{len(plan_goals)} objectives achieved)') # Location-specific findings location_findings = [] for finding in sorted_findings: if any(loc in finding['evidence'] for loc in ['Harmony/Oakland location', 'Pennsylvania location']): location_findings.append(finding) if location_findings: print('\n📍 LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS:') print('-' * 40) for i, loc_finding in enumerate(location_findings[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. {loc_finding["title"][:80]}...') print(f' URL: {loc_finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(loc_finding["evidence"])}') print(f' Content: {loc_finding["body_excerpt"][:150]}...') # Save results final_results = { 'research_summary': research_summary, 'plan_success_rate': success_rate, 'plan_objectives': plan_goals, 'evidence_analysis': dict(evidence_counts), 'top_findings': sorted_findings[:8], 'location_findings': location_findings[:5] } results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_final.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(final_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\n💾 Results saved to: {results_file}') # Create summary report summary_content = f'''LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH HARMONY/OAKLAND PENNSYLVANIA AREA - FINAL RESULTS Generated: {research_summary["timestamp"]} RESEARCH OBJECTIVE: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring and restoring historical properties in 1962, following their 1960 monument placement at the Priesthood Restoration Site. EXECUTION SUMMARY: • Queries attempted: {research_summary["queries_attempted"]} • Successful searches: {research_summary["successful_searches"]} • Results processed: {research_summary["total_results_found"]} • Relevant findings: {research_summary["relevant_findings_count"]} • PLAN success rate: {success_rate:.1f}% PLAN OBJECTIVES RESULTS: ''' for goal, achieved in plan_goals.items(): status = 'ACHIEVED' if achieved else 'NOT FOUND' summary_content += f'• {goal}: {status}\n' summary_content += f'''\nEVIDENCE ANALYSIS: ''' for evidence_type, count in evidence_counts.most_common(): summary_content += f'• {evidence_type}: {count} mentions\n' summary_content += f'''\nTOP FINDINGS: ''' for i, finding in enumerate(sorted_findings[:3], 1): summary_content += f'''{i}. {finding["title"]} URL: {finding["url"]} Relevance: {finding["relevance_score"]} Evidence: {", ".join(finding["evidence"])} Content: {finding["body_excerpt"][:200]}... ''' if location_findings: summary_content += f'''LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS: ''' for i, loc_finding in enumerate(location_findings[:2], 1): summary_content += f'{i}. {loc_finding["title"]}\n {loc_finding["body_excerpt"][:200]}...\n\n' summary_content += f'''FILES GENERATED: • lds_church_1962_research_final.json - Complete research data • lds_church_1962_final_summary.txt - This summary report CONCLUSIONS: ''' if success_rate >= 60: summary_content += 'Research successful - multiple PLAN objectives achieved\n' elif success_rate >= 40: summary_content += 'Partial success - some PLAN objectives identified\n' else: summary_content += 'Limited success - further research approaches needed\n' summary_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_final_summary.txt') with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(summary_content) print(f'📋 Summary report saved to: {summary_file}') else: print('\n❌ No relevant findings collected') # Save empty results empty_results = { 'research_summary': research_summary, 'plan_success_rate': 0, 'message': 'No relevant findings collected' } results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_final.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(empty_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'💾 Empty results saved to: {results_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 70) print('LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH COMPLETE') print('=' * 70) if research_summary['relevant_findings_count'] >= 3: print('✅ RESEARCH SUCCESSFUL - Multiple relevant findings') elif research_summary['relevant_findings_count'] >= 1: print('⚠️ PARTIAL SUCCESS - Some findings collected') else: print('❌ LIMITED SUCCESS - No relevant findings') print(f'\n📊 FINAL STATISTICS:') print(f' • Queries executed: {research_summary["queries_attempted"]}') print(f' • Successful searches: {research_summary["successful_searches"]}') print(f' • Results processed: {research_summary["total_results_found"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {research_summary["relevant_findings_count"]}') print(f' • Evidence types found: {len(set(all_evidence))}') if all_evidence: unique_evidence = list(set(all_evidence)) print('\n🎯 EVIDENCE TYPES COLLECTED:') for evidence in unique_evidence: print(f' ✅ {evidence}') print('\n=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH EXECUTION COMPLETE ===')

Code Execution - Plan #2 (Iteration 6)

Python Code python
from ddgs import DDGS import os import json import time from collections import Counter print('=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH - FRESH START ===') print('Objective: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring/restoring historical properties in 1962') print('Focus: Harmony/Oakland PA area, Susquehanna County, following 1960 Priesthood Restoration Site monument') print('Strategy: Completely fresh search with explicit result validation\n') # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Initialize research tracking with explicit structure research_data = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Identify LDS Church 1962 property acquisition in Harmony/Oakland PA area', 'search_attempts': 0, 'valid_searches': 0, 'total_results': 0, 'relevant_findings': [], 'evidence_collected': [], 'location_findings': [] } # Define focused search queries search_queries = [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania', 'Church Jesus Christ Latter-day Saints 1962 Pennsylvania property', 'Mormon Church 1962 property restoration Pennsylvania Susquehanna', 'LDS Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 Pennsylvania projects' ] print(f'Executing {len(search_queries)} targeted searches:') for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f' {i}. {query}') # Create fresh searcher instance searcher = DDGS(timeout=20) print('\n=== FRESH SEARCH EXECUTION WITH RESULT VALIDATION ===') print('=' * 70) # Execute searches with explicit result validation for search_index, query_text in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {search_index}: {query_text}') print('-' * 60) research_data['search_attempts'] += 1 try: # Execute search with fresh instance search_results = searcher.text( query_text, max_results=6, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if search_results and len(search_results) > 0: print(f'Retrieved {len(search_results)} results') research_data['valid_searches'] += 1 research_data['total_results'] += len(search_results) # Validate that results are relevant to our query relevant_results_count = 0 # Process each result with explicit validation for result_num, result_data in enumerate(search_results, 1): print(f' Processing result {result_num}...') # Extract result components with explicit error handling try: # Get result data with defaults result_title = result_data.get('title', '') result_body = result_data.get('body', '') result_url = result_data.get('href', '') # Validate this is actually about our topic title_lower = result_title.lower() body_lower = result_body.lower() # Check if result is relevant to LDS/Mormon Church lds_relevant = any(term in title_lower or term in body_lower for term in [ 'lds', 'mormon', 'latter-day saints', 'church of jesus christ' ]) # Skip if not relevant to LDS Church if not lds_relevant: print(f' ❌ Result {result_num}: Not LDS-related, skipping') continue relevant_results_count += 1 print(f' ✅ Result {result_num}: LDS-related content confirmed') # Create combined text for analysis analysis_text = title_lower + ' ' + body_lower # Initialize evidence tracking evidence_found = [] relevance_points = 0 # Check for LDS Church confirmation if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['lds church', 'church of jesus christ', 'latter-day saints', 'mormon church']): evidence_found.append('LDS Church confirmed') relevance_points += 10 print(' 🏛️ LDS Church confirmed!') # Check for 1962 date if '1962' in analysis_text: evidence_found.append('1962 date confirmed') relevance_points += 15 print(' 📅 1962 date confirmed!') # Check for property-related terms property_terms = ['property acquisition', 'property restoration', 'historical property', 'property purchase', 'acquired property', 'restored property'] if any(term in analysis_text for term in property_terms): evidence_found.append('Property project confirmed') relevance_points += 12 print(' 🏠 Property project confirmed!') # Check for Pennsylvania/Harmony/Oakland if 'harmony' in analysis_text or 'oakland' in analysis_text: evidence_found.append('Harmony/Oakland location') relevance_points += 15 print(' 📍 Harmony/Oakland location!') if 'pennsylvania' in analysis_text or 'susquehanna county' in analysis_text: evidence_found.append('Pennsylvania location') relevance_points += 10 print(' 🗺️ Pennsylvania location!') # Check for Priesthood Restoration Site if 'priesthood restoration' in analysis_text: evidence_found.append('Priesthood Restoration Site') relevance_points += 12 print(' ⛪ Priesthood Restoration Site!') # Check for 1960s timeframe if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['1960', '1961', '1963', '1960s', 'early 1960s']): evidence_found.append('1960s timeframe') relevance_points += 8 print(' ⏰ 1960s timeframe!') # Store findings if relevant if relevance_points >= 10 or len(evidence_found) >= 2: finding_record = { 'search_number': search_index, 'result_number': result_num, 'query': query_text, 'title': result_title, 'body_excerpt': result_body[:300], 'url': result_url, 'relevance_score': relevance_points, 'evidence': evidence_found } research_data['relevant_findings'].append(finding_record) research_data['evidence_collected'].extend(evidence_found) # Track location-specific findings if any(loc in evidence_found for loc in ['Harmony/Oakland location', 'Pennsylvania location']): research_data['location_findings'].append(finding_record) print(f' 📋 STORED: Score {relevance_points}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(evidence_found)}') print(f' Title: {result_title[:80]}...') except Exception as processing_error: print(f' ❌ Error processing result {result_num}: {str(processing_error)}') continue print(f'\n 📊 Search {search_index} Summary:') print(f' • Results retrieved: {len(search_results)}') print(f' • LDS-relevant results: {relevant_results_count}') print(f' • Relevant findings stored: {len([f for f in research_data["relevant_findings"] if f["search_number"] == search_index])}') else: print('No results returned') except Exception as search_error: print(f'Search error: {str(search_error)}') # Pause between searches time.sleep(3) print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('COMPREHENSIVE RESEARCH ANALYSIS') print('=' * 80) print(f'Execution Summary:') print(f' • Search attempts: {research_data["search_attempts"]}') print(f' • Valid searches: {research_data["valid_searches"]}') print(f' • Total results processed: {research_data["total_results"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {len(research_data["relevant_findings"])}') print(f' • Evidence pieces: {len(research_data["evidence_collected"])}') print(f' • Location-specific findings: {len(research_data["location_findings"])}') if research_data['relevant_findings']: # Sort findings by relevance score sorted_findings = sorted(research_data['relevant_findings'], key=lambda x: x['relevance_score'], reverse=True) print('\n📊 TOP RELEVANT FINDINGS:') print('-' * 50) for i, finding in enumerate(sorted_findings[:5], 1): print(f'\n{i}. Relevance Score: {finding["relevance_score"]}') print(f' Title: {finding["title"][:100]}...') print(f' URL: {finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(finding["evidence"])}') print(f' Content: {finding["body_excerpt"][:150]}...') # Evidence frequency analysis evidence_counts = Counter(research_data['evidence_collected']) print('\n📈 EVIDENCE FREQUENCY ANALYSIS:') print('-' * 40) for evidence_type, count in evidence_counts.most_common(): print(f' • {evidence_type}: {count} occurrences') # PLAN objectives assessment plan_objectives = { 'LDS Church identified': 'LDS Church confirmed' in research_data['evidence_collected'], '1962 date confirmed': '1962 date confirmed' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Property projects found': 'Property project confirmed' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Harmony/Oakland location': 'Harmony/Oakland location' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Pennsylvania confirmed': 'Pennsylvania location' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Priesthood Restoration connection': 'Priesthood Restoration Site' in research_data['evidence_collected'], '1960s timeframe confirmed': '1960s timeframe' in research_data['evidence_collected'] } print('\n🎯 PLAN OBJECTIVES ASSESSMENT:') print('-' * 40) objectives_achieved = 0 for objective, achieved in plan_objectives.items(): status = '✅' if achieved else '❌' print(f'{status} {objective}: {achieved}') if achieved: objectives_achieved += 1 success_rate = (objectives_achieved / len(plan_objectives)) * 100 print(f'\n📈 PLAN SUCCESS RATE: {success_rate:.1f}% ({objectives_achieved}/{len(plan_objectives)} objectives achieved)') # Location-specific analysis if research_data['location_findings']: print('\n📍 LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS:') print('-' * 45) for i, loc_finding in enumerate(research_data['location_findings'][:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. {loc_finding["title"][:80]}...') print(f' URL: {loc_finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(loc_finding["evidence"])}') print(f' Content: {loc_finding["body_excerpt"][:180]}...') # Save comprehensive results final_results = { 'research_summary': research_data, 'plan_success_rate': success_rate, 'plan_objectives': plan_objectives, 'evidence_analysis': dict(evidence_counts), 'top_findings': sorted_findings[:10], 'location_specific_findings': research_data['location_findings'] } results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_validated.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(final_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\n💾 Results saved to: {results_file}') # Create detailed summary report summary_content = f'''LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH HARMONY/OAKLAND PENNSYLVANIA AREA - VALIDATED RESULTS Generated: {research_data["timestamp"]} RESEARCH OBJECTIVE: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring and restoring historical properties in 1962, following their 1960 monument placement at the Priesthood Restoration Site. EXECUTION SUMMARY: • Search attempts: {research_data["search_attempts"]} • Valid searches: {research_data["valid_searches"]} • Results processed: {research_data["total_results"]} • Relevant findings: {len(research_data["relevant_findings"])} • PLAN success rate: {success_rate:.1f}% PLAN OBJECTIVES RESULTS: ''' for objective, achieved in plan_objectives.items(): status = 'ACHIEVED' if achieved else 'NOT FOUND' summary_content += f'• {objective}: {status}\n' summary_content += f'''\nEVIDENCE ANALYSIS: ''' for evidence_type, count in evidence_counts.most_common(): summary_content += f'• {evidence_type}: {count} mentions\n' summary_content += f'''\nTOP FINDINGS: ''' for i, finding in enumerate(sorted_findings[:3], 1): summary_content += f'''{i}. {finding["title"]} URL: {finding["url"]} Relevance: {finding["relevance_score"]} Evidence: {", ".join(finding["evidence"])} Content: {finding["body_excerpt"][:200]}... ''' if research_data['location_findings']: summary_content += f'''LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS: ''' for i, loc_finding in enumerate(research_data['location_findings'][:2], 1): summary_content += f'{i}. {loc_finding["title"]}\n {loc_finding["body_excerpt"][:200]}...\n\n' summary_content += f'''FILES GENERATED: • lds_church_1962_research_validated.json - Complete research data • lds_church_1962_validated_summary.txt - This summary report CONCLUSIONS: ''' if success_rate >= 60: summary_content += 'Research successful - multiple PLAN objectives achieved\n' elif success_rate >= 40: summary_content += 'Partial success - some PLAN objectives identified\n' else: summary_content += 'Limited success - further research approaches needed\n' summary_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_validated_summary.txt') with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(summary_content) print(f'📋 Summary report saved to: {summary_file}') else: print('\n❌ No relevant findings collected') # Save empty results for reference empty_results = { 'research_summary': research_data, 'plan_success_rate': 0, 'message': 'No relevant findings collected' } results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_validated.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(empty_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'💾 Empty results saved to: {results_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH COMPLETE') print('=' * 80) if len(research_data['relevant_findings']) >= 3: print('✅ RESEARCH SUCCESSFUL - Multiple relevant findings') elif len(research_data['relevant_findings']) >= 1: print('⚠️ PARTIAL SUCCESS - Some findings collected') else: print('❌ LIMITED SUCCESS - No relevant findings') print(f'\n📊 FINAL STATISTICS:') print(f' • Search attempts: {research_data["search_attempts"]}') print(f' • Valid searches: {research_data["valid_searches"]}') print(f' • Results processed: {research_data["total_results"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {len(research_data["relevant_findings"])}') print(f' • Location findings: {len(research_data["location_findings"])}') print(f' • Evidence types: {len(set(research_data["evidence_collected"]))}') if research_data['evidence_collected']: unique_evidence = list(set(research_data['evidence_collected'])) print('\n🎯 EVIDENCE TYPES COLLECTED:') for evidence in unique_evidence: print(f' ✅ {evidence}') print('\n=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH EXECUTION COMPLETE ===')
Execution Output

The output also shows concerning signs of result contamination, displaying unrelated content about Henry IV, duchies, and Aachen Cathedral instead of LDS Church research results. **Critical issues**: (1) The fundamental variable scoping problem remains unresolved across multiple code iterations, and (2) the search system appears to be returning cached or mixed results from different research contexts. **Recommended solution**: Save the lengthy output to a workspace file for detailed analysis, then completely rewrite the search and processing logic with a minimal, step-by-step approach that defines each variable explicitly with immediate validation before any usage. The persistent nature of this error suggests a fundamental structural issue that requires a ground-up rebuild of the result processing methodology.
Python Code python
from ddgs import DDGS import os import json import time from collections import Counter print('=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH - FRESH START ===') print('Objective: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring/restoring historical properties in 1962') print('Focus: Harmony/Oakland PA area, Susquehanna County, following 1960 Priesthood Restoration Site monument') print('Strategy: Completely fresh search with explicit result validation\n') # Ensure workspace directory exists os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) # Initialize research tracking with explicit structure research_data = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Identify LDS Church 1962 property acquisition in Harmony/Oakland PA area', 'search_attempts': 0, 'valid_searches': 0, 'total_results': 0, 'relevant_findings': [], 'evidence_collected': [], 'location_findings': [] } # Define focused search queries search_queries = [ 'LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania', 'Church Jesus Christ Latter-day Saints 1962 Pennsylvania property', 'Mormon Church 1962 property restoration Pennsylvania Susquehanna', 'LDS Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 Pennsylvania projects' ] print(f'Executing {len(search_queries)} targeted searches:') for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f' {i}. {query}') # Create fresh searcher instance searcher = DDGS(timeout=20) print('\n=== FRESH SEARCH EXECUTION WITH RESULT VALIDATION ===') print('=' * 70) # Execute searches with explicit result validation for search_index, query_text in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {search_index}: {query_text}') print('-' * 60) research_data['search_attempts'] += 1 try: # Execute search with fresh instance search_results = searcher.text( query_text, max_results=6, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if search_results and len(search_results) > 0: print(f'Retrieved {len(search_results)} results') research_data['valid_searches'] += 1 research_data['total_results'] += len(search_results) # Validate that results are relevant to our query relevant_results_count = 0 # Process each result with explicit validation for result_num, result_data in enumerate(search_results, 1): print(f' Processing result {result_num}...') # Extract result components with explicit error handling try: # Get result data with defaults result_title = result_data.get('title', '') result_body = result_data.get('body', '') result_url = result_data.get('href', '') # Validate this is actually about our topic title_lower = result_title.lower() body_lower = result_body.lower() # Check if result is relevant to LDS/Mormon Church lds_relevant = any(term in title_lower or term in body_lower for term in [ 'lds', 'mormon', 'latter-day saints', 'church of jesus christ' ]) # Skip if not relevant to LDS Church if not lds_relevant: print(f' ❌ Result {result_num}: Not LDS-related, skipping') continue relevant_results_count += 1 print(f' ✅ Result {result_num}: LDS-related content confirmed') # Create combined text for analysis analysis_text = title_lower + ' ' + body_lower # Initialize evidence tracking evidence_found = [] relevance_points = 0 # Check for LDS Church confirmation if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['lds church', 'church of jesus christ', 'latter-day saints', 'mormon church']): evidence_found.append('LDS Church confirmed') relevance_points += 10 print(' 🏛️ LDS Church confirmed!') # Check for 1962 date if '1962' in analysis_text: evidence_found.append('1962 date confirmed') relevance_points += 15 print(' 📅 1962 date confirmed!') # Check for property-related terms property_terms = ['property acquisition', 'property restoration', 'historical property', 'property purchase', 'acquired property', 'restored property'] if any(term in analysis_text for term in property_terms): evidence_found.append('Property project confirmed') relevance_points += 12 print(' 🏠 Property project confirmed!') # Check for Pennsylvania/Harmony/Oakland if 'harmony' in analysis_text or 'oakland' in analysis_text: evidence_found.append('Harmony/Oakland location') relevance_points += 15 print(' 📍 Harmony/Oakland location!') if 'pennsylvania' in analysis_text or 'susquehanna county' in analysis_text: evidence_found.append('Pennsylvania location') relevance_points += 10 print(' 🗺️ Pennsylvania location!') # Check for Priesthood Restoration Site if 'priesthood restoration' in analysis_text: evidence_found.append('Priesthood Restoration Site') relevance_points += 12 print(' ⛪ Priesthood Restoration Site!') # Check for 1960s timeframe if any(term in analysis_text for term in ['1960', '1961', '1963', '1960s', 'early 1960s']): evidence_found.append('1960s timeframe') relevance_points += 8 print(' ⏰ 1960s timeframe!') # Store findings if relevant if relevance_points >= 10 or len(evidence_found) >= 2: finding_record = { 'search_number': search_index, 'result_number': result_num, 'query': query_text, 'title': result_title, 'body_excerpt': result_body[:300], 'url': result_url, 'relevance_score': relevance_points, 'evidence': evidence_found } research_data['relevant_findings'].append(finding_record) research_data['evidence_collected'].extend(evidence_found) # Track location-specific findings if any(loc in evidence_found for loc in ['Harmony/Oakland location', 'Pennsylvania location']): research_data['location_findings'].append(finding_record) print(f' 📋 STORED: Score {relevance_points}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(evidence_found)}') print(f' Title: {result_title[:80]}...') except Exception as processing_error: print(f' ❌ Error processing result {result_num}: {str(processing_error)}') continue print(f'\n 📊 Search {search_index} Summary:') print(f' • Results retrieved: {len(search_results)}') print(f' • LDS-relevant results: {relevant_results_count}') print(f' • Relevant findings stored: {len([f for f in research_data["relevant_findings"] if f["search_number"] == search_index])}') else: print('No results returned') except Exception as search_error: print(f'Search error: {str(search_error)}') # Pause between searches time.sleep(3) print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('COMPREHENSIVE RESEARCH ANALYSIS') print('=' * 80) print(f'Execution Summary:') print(f' • Search attempts: {research_data["search_attempts"]}') print(f' • Valid searches: {research_data["valid_searches"]}') print(f' • Total results processed: {research_data["total_results"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {len(research_data["relevant_findings"])}') print(f' • Evidence pieces: {len(research_data["evidence_collected"])}') print(f' • Location-specific findings: {len(research_data["location_findings"])}') if research_data['relevant_findings']: # Sort findings by relevance score sorted_findings = sorted(research_data['relevant_findings'], key=lambda x: x['relevance_score'], reverse=True) print('\n📊 TOP RELEVANT FINDINGS:') print('-' * 50) for i, finding in enumerate(sorted_findings[:5], 1): print(f'\n{i}. Relevance Score: {finding["relevance_score"]}') print(f' Title: {finding["title"][:100]}...') print(f' URL: {finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(finding["evidence"])}') print(f' Content: {finding["body_excerpt"][:150]}...') # Evidence frequency analysis evidence_counts = Counter(research_data['evidence_collected']) print('\n📈 EVIDENCE FREQUENCY ANALYSIS:') print('-' * 40) for evidence_type, count in evidence_counts.most_common(): print(f' • {evidence_type}: {count} occurrences') # PLAN objectives assessment plan_objectives = { 'LDS Church identified': 'LDS Church confirmed' in research_data['evidence_collected'], '1962 date confirmed': '1962 date confirmed' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Property projects found': 'Property project confirmed' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Harmony/Oakland location': 'Harmony/Oakland location' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Pennsylvania confirmed': 'Pennsylvania location' in research_data['evidence_collected'], 'Priesthood Restoration connection': 'Priesthood Restoration Site' in research_data['evidence_collected'], '1960s timeframe confirmed': '1960s timeframe' in research_data['evidence_collected'] } print('\n🎯 PLAN OBJECTIVES ASSESSMENT:') print('-' * 40) objectives_achieved = 0 for objective, achieved in plan_objectives.items(): status = '✅' if achieved else '❌' print(f'{status} {objective}: {achieved}') if achieved: objectives_achieved += 1 success_rate = (objectives_achieved / len(plan_objectives)) * 100 print(f'\n📈 PLAN SUCCESS RATE: {success_rate:.1f}% ({objectives_achieved}/{len(plan_objectives)} objectives achieved)') # Location-specific analysis if research_data['location_findings']: print('\n📍 LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS:') print('-' * 45) for i, loc_finding in enumerate(research_data['location_findings'][:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. {loc_finding["title"][:80]}...') print(f' URL: {loc_finding["url"]}') print(f' Evidence: {", ".join(loc_finding["evidence"])}') print(f' Content: {loc_finding["body_excerpt"][:180]}...') # Save comprehensive results final_results = { 'research_summary': research_data, 'plan_success_rate': success_rate, 'plan_objectives': plan_objectives, 'evidence_analysis': dict(evidence_counts), 'top_findings': sorted_findings[:10], 'location_specific_findings': research_data['location_findings'] } results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_validated.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(final_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\n💾 Results saved to: {results_file}') # Create detailed summary report summary_content = f'''LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY ACQUISITION RESEARCH HARMONY/OAKLAND PENNSYLVANIA AREA - VALIDATED RESULTS Generated: {research_data["timestamp"]} RESEARCH OBJECTIVE: Identify exact town where LDS Church began acquiring and restoring historical properties in 1962, following their 1960 monument placement at the Priesthood Restoration Site. EXECUTION SUMMARY: • Search attempts: {research_data["search_attempts"]} • Valid searches: {research_data["valid_searches"]} • Results processed: {research_data["total_results"]} • Relevant findings: {len(research_data["relevant_findings"])} • PLAN success rate: {success_rate:.1f}% PLAN OBJECTIVES RESULTS: ''' for objective, achieved in plan_objectives.items(): status = 'ACHIEVED' if achieved else 'NOT FOUND' summary_content += f'• {objective}: {status}\n' summary_content += f'''\nEVIDENCE ANALYSIS: ''' for evidence_type, count in evidence_counts.most_common(): summary_content += f'• {evidence_type}: {count} mentions\n' summary_content += f'''\nTOP FINDINGS: ''' for i, finding in enumerate(sorted_findings[:3], 1): summary_content += f'''{i}. {finding["title"]} URL: {finding["url"]} Relevance: {finding["relevance_score"]} Evidence: {", ".join(finding["evidence"])} Content: {finding["body_excerpt"][:200]}... ''' if research_data['location_findings']: summary_content += f'''LOCATION-SPECIFIC FINDINGS: ''' for i, loc_finding in enumerate(research_data['location_findings'][:2], 1): summary_content += f'{i}. {loc_finding["title"]}\n {loc_finding["body_excerpt"][:200]}...\n\n' summary_content += f'''FILES GENERATED: • lds_church_1962_research_validated.json - Complete research data • lds_church_1962_validated_summary.txt - This summary report CONCLUSIONS: ''' if success_rate >= 60: summary_content += 'Research successful - multiple PLAN objectives achieved\n' elif success_rate >= 40: summary_content += 'Partial success - some PLAN objectives identified\n' else: summary_content += 'Limited success - further research approaches needed\n' summary_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_validated_summary.txt') with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(summary_content) print(f'📋 Summary report saved to: {summary_file}') else: print('\n❌ No relevant findings collected') # Save empty results for reference empty_results = { 'research_summary': research_data, 'plan_success_rate': 0, 'message': 'No relevant findings collected' } results_file = os.path.join('workspace', 'lds_church_1962_research_validated.json') with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(empty_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'💾 Empty results saved to: {results_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH COMPLETE') print('=' * 80) if len(research_data['relevant_findings']) >= 3: print('✅ RESEARCH SUCCESSFUL - Multiple relevant findings') elif len(research_data['relevant_findings']) >= 1: print('⚠️ PARTIAL SUCCESS - Some findings collected') else: print('❌ LIMITED SUCCESS - No relevant findings') print(f'\n📊 FINAL STATISTICS:') print(f' • Search attempts: {research_data["search_attempts"]}') print(f' • Valid searches: {research_data["valid_searches"]}') print(f' • Results processed: {research_data["total_results"]}') print(f' • Relevant findings: {len(research_data["relevant_findings"])}') print(f' • Location findings: {len(research_data["location_findings"])}') print(f' • Evidence types: {len(set(research_data["evidence_collected"]))}') if research_data['evidence_collected']: unique_evidence = list(set(research_data['evidence_collected'])) print('\n🎯 EVIDENCE TYPES COLLECTED:') for evidence in unique_evidence: print(f' ✅ {evidence}') print('\n=== LDS CHURCH 1962 PROPERTY RESEARCH EXECUTION COMPLETE ===')

LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania 2. Church Jesus Christ Latter-day Saints 1962 Pennsylvania property 3. Mormon Church 1962 property restoration Pennsylvania Susquehanna 4. LDS Priesthood Restoration Site 1960 1962 Pennsylvania projects === FRESH SEARCH EXECUTION WITH RESULT VALIDATION === ====================================================================== Search 1: LDS Church property acquisition 1962 Harmony Pennsylvania ------------------------------------------------------------ Retrieved 6 results Processing result 1... ❌ Error processing result 1: name
